enum  bcm_switch_ecmp_hash_bit_count_e {
  BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_10 = 0, BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_11 = 1, BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_12 = 2, BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_13 = 3,
  BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_14 = 4, BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_15 = 5, BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_16 = 6

  bcmSwitchSvtagErrCodeIpv4ChecksumMismatchOrMplsBosNotFound = 4, bcmSwitchSvtagErrCodeInvalidSectag = 5, bcmSwitchSvtagErrCodeScTcamMiss = 6, bcmSwitchSvtagErrCodeNoSa = 7,
  bcmSwitchSvtagErrCodeReplayFailure = 8, bcmSwitchSvtagErrCodeCount = 9
}
 
enum  bcm_switch_range_operator_e {
  bcmSwitchRangeOperatorInvalid = -1, bcmSwitchRangeOperatorFirst = 0, bcmSwitchRangeOperatorNone = bcmSwitchRangeOperatorFirst, bcmSwitchRangeOperatorFirstPairAnd = 1,
  bcmSwitchRangeOperatorSecondPairAnd = 2, bcmSwitchRangeOperatorBothPairAnd = 3, bcmSwitchRangeOperator64bPairAndLow = 4, bcmSwitchRangeOperator64bPairAndHigh = 5,
  bcmSwitchRangeOperatorFirstPairOr = 6, bcmSwitchRangeOperatorSecondPairOr = 7, bcmSwitchRangeOperatorBothPairOr = 8, bcmSwitchRangeOperator64bPairOrLow = 9,
  bcmSwitchRangeOperator64bPairOrHigh = 10, bcmSwitchRangeOperatorCount = 11
}
 
enum  bcm_switch_range_result_map_e {
  bcmSwitchRangeResultMapInvalid = -1, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirst = 0, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapNone = bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirst, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirstOnly = 1,
  bcmSwitchRangeResultMapSecondOnly = 2, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapThirdOnly = 3, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapForthOnly = 4, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirstnSecond = 5,
  bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirstnThird = 6, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirstnForth = 7, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapSecondnThird = 8, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapSecondnForth = 9,
  bcmSwitchRangeResultMapThirdnForth = 10, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirstnSecondnThird = 11, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirstnSecondnForth = 12, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirstnThirdnForth = 13,
  bcmSwitchRangeResultMapSecondnThirdnForth = 14, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapFirstnSecondnThirdnForth = 15, bcmSwitchRangeResultMapCount = 16
}

int bcm_switch_temperature_monitor_get (int unit, int temperature_max, bcm_switch_temperature_monitor_t *temperature_array, int *temperature_count)
 There are temperature monitors embedded in the various points of some switch chips for the purpose of monitoring the health of the chip. This API retrieves each temperature monitor's current value and peak value. The value unit is 0.1 celsius degree. Table bcm_switch_temperature_monitor_t describes the meaning of each field of the structure bcm_switch_temperature_monitor_t. More...

◆ bcm_switch_encap_dest_t

Encap destination struct

◆ bcm_switch_encap_info_t

typedef struct bcm_switch_encap_info_s bcm_switch_encap_info_t

Encap info structure.

The following parameters are required when the encap type is MIML: egress_vlan, egress_srcmac, egress_dstmac, pkt_pri, pkt_cfi, pkt_type, iid, length and port.

The following parameters are required when the encap type is CUSTOM_HEADER: value32.

The other optional configurations depend on "flags" definition per service: e.g. qos_map_id , higig_vlan.

Priority for sFlow sample to CPU.

Send unknown multicasts to CPU.

Invalid checksum, TTL 0, etc.

bcmSwitchUnknownL3DestToCpu

TCP Header offset equals to 1 check.

UDP packets where SPORT = DROP.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpPortsEqual 

TCP packets where SPORT = DROP.

TCP packets with SYN & FIN bits enabled.

TCP packets with FIN, URG, PSH bits set and sequence number equals 0.

TCP packets with not full TCP header.

Enable ping flood checking.

bcmSwitchDosAttackSynFlood 

Enable SYN flood checking.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpSmurf 

Enable TCP smurf checking.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpXMas 

SeqNum, Fin,Urg,Psh equal 0.

bcmSwitchDosAttackL3Header 

Ipv4/6 header length checks.

ICMP redirect To CPU.

bcmSwitchControlAutoSync

bcmSwitchReserveLowL3InterfaceId 

Set the lower inclusive bounds of the L3 Interfaces. Get will return the lowest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range.

bcmSwitchReserveHighL3InterfaceId 

Set the higher inclusive bounds of the L3 Interfaces. Get will return the lowest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range.

bcmSwitchReserveLowL3EgressId 

Set the lower inclusive bounds of the L3 Egress object. Get will return the lowest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range.

bcmSwitchReserveHighL3EgressId

bcmSwitchReserveLowVlanPort 

Set the lower inclusive bounds of the vlan gport resources. Get will return the lowest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

bcmSwitchReserveHighVlanPort 

Set the highest inclusive bounds of the vlan gport resources. Get will return the highest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

Set the lower inclusive bounds of the mpls gport resources. Get will return the lowest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

bcmSwitchReserveHighMplsPort

Set the lower inclusive bounds of the mim gport resources. Get will return the lowest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

bcmSwitchReserveHighMimPort 

Set the highest inclusive bounds of the mim gport resources. Get will return the highest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

Set the lower inclusive bounds of the Encap ID resources used internally by gports. Get will return the lowest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

bcmSwitchReserveHighEncap 

Set the highest inclusive bounds of the Encap ID resources used internally by gports. Get will return the highest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

bcmSwitchReserveHighL2Egress

bcmSwitchReserveHighVpn

bcmSwitchReserveHighFailoverId

bcmSwitchSnapNonZeroOui 

Decode SNAP packets with non-zero OUI for protocol-based VLAN

bcmSwitchSynchronousPortClockSource 

Set ITU-T G.8261/8262 synchronous Ethernet recovered clock source. Setting -1 selects in free-run mode (no recovered clock). Get returns the current value.

bcmSwitchSynchronousPortClockSourceBkup 

Set ITU-T G.8261/8262 synchronous Ethernet recovered backup clock source. Get returns the current value.

bcmSwitchSynchronousPortClockSourceDivCtrl 

Set ITU-T G.8261/8262 synchronous Ethernet recovered clock source. Setting -1 selects the divide by five logic. Get returns the current value.

bcmSwitchSynchronousPortClockSourceBkupDivCtrl 

Set ITU-T G.8261/8262 synchronous Ethernet recovered backup clock source. Setting -1 selects the divide by five logic. Get returns the current value.

bcmSwitchL2HitClear 

Clear L2 source and destination hit bits when set to 1

bcmSwitchL2SrcHitClear 

Clear L2 source hit bits when set to 1

bcmSwitchL2DstHitClear 

Clear L2 destination hit bits when set to 1

bcmSwitchL3HostHitClear 

Clear L3 host hit bits when set to 1

bcmSwitchL3RouteHitClear 

Clear L3 route hit bits when set to 1

bcmSwitchIpmcSameVlanPruning 

Allow both L2 and L3 copies of a packet to go out on a physical port if it happens to be a member of both the L2 and L3 bitmaps of the replication group.

bcmSwitchDeprecated492 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated493 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchL2McIdxRetType 

When set to 1, L2 multicast API will return multicast index as bcm_multicast_t instead of hardware multicast index.

bcmSwitchL3McIdxRetType 

When set to 1, IP multicast API will return multicast index as bcm_multicast_t instead of hardware multicast index.

bcmSwitchDeprecated496 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated497 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated498 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated499 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated500 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchArpDhcpToCpu 

Set both ARP and DHCP to CPU.

bcmSwitchIgmpMldToCpu 

Set the snooping mode on both IGMP and MLD together.

bcmSwitchLinkDownInfoSkip 

Skip port information gathering during linkdown event notification

bcmSwitchDeprecated504 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchL2SourceDiscardMoveToCpu 

SRC MAC discard configuration to CPU

bcmSwitchNivEthertype 

Set EtherType field in VNTAG

bcmSwitchNivPrioDropToCpu 

NIV priority admittance drop to CPU

bcmSwitchNivInterfaceMissToCpu 

NIV forwarding lookup miss to CPU

bcmSwitchNivRpfFailToCpu 

NIV RPF check fail to CPU

bcmSwitchNivTagInvalidToCpu 

Invalid VNTAG to CPU

bcmSwitchNivTagDropToCpu 

VNTAG present to CPU

bcmSwitchNivUntagDropToCpu 

VNTAG not present to CPU

bcmSwitchEEEPipelineTime 

Time (in system clock cycles) for MAC to ensure that the egress pipeline is empty prior to the assertion of the LPI control signal.

bcmSwitchEEEGlobalCongestionThreshold 

If this threshold is exceeded, EEE is disabled for all ports.

bcmSwitchDeprecated515 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated516 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated517 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated518 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated519 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated520 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated521 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuSchanEnable 

Enables SCHAN requests for Remote CPU feature

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuFromCpuEnable 

Enables recieving packets from CPU for Remote CPU feature

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuToCpuEnable 

Enables sending packet to CPU for Remote CPU feature

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuCmicEnable 

Enables CMIC requests for Remote CPU feature

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuMatchLocalMac 

Local MAC addresses matching for Remote CPU feature

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuMatchVlan 

VLAN matching for Remote CPU feature

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuVlan 

VLAN tag to be inserted into Remote CPU packets

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuTpid 

TPID tag to be inserted into Remote CPU packets

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuSignature 

Unique Signature for Remote CPU packets

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuForceScheduling 

Remote CPU packets are forced to have COS value

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuToCpuDestPortAllReasons 

Remote CPU packets to be forwarded for all directed reasons

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuToCpuDestMacAllReasons 

Remote CPU packets to be forwarded for all reasons

bcmSwitchRxRedirectPktReasons 

All forwarding reasons for normal packets

bcmSwitchRxRedirectPktReasonsExtended 

All extended forwarding reasons for normal packets

bcmSwitchRxRedirectHigigPktReasons 

All forwarding reasons for higig packets

bcmSwitchRxRedirectHigigPktReasonsExtended 

All extended forwarding reasons for higig packets

bcmSwitchRxRedirectTruncatedPktReasons 

All forwarding reasons for truncated packets

bcmSwitchRxRedirectTruncatedPktReasonsExtended 

All extended forwarding reasons for truncated packets

bcmSwitchRxRedirectPktCos 

All forwarding COS queue bitmap for normal packets

bcmSwitchRxRedirectPktCosExtended 

All extended forwarding COS queue bitmap for normal packets

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuLocalMacOui 

Higher 3 bytes of Local MAC address used for Remote CPU

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuLocalMacNonOui 

Lower 3 bytes of Local MAC address used for Remote CPU

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuDestMacOui 

Higher 3 bytes of Destination MAC address used for Remote CPU

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuDestMacNonOui 

Lower 3 bytes of Destination MAC address used for Remote CPU

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuEthertype 

Remote CPU EtherType

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuDestPort 

Remote CPU will direct raw data packets with SOBMH header to a given port

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuHigigDestPort 

Remote CPU will direct raw data packets with HiGig header to a given port

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuTcMappingMacOui 

Higher 3 bytes of Destination MAC address used to match received ToCPU packets

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuTcMappingMacNonOui 

Lower 3 bytes of Destination MAC address used to match received ToCPU packets

bcmSwitchRemoteCpuTcMappingEthertype 

EtherType used to match received ToCPU packets

bcmSwitchServiceTpidReplace 

Replace TPID in Service Delimiting SD-TAG

bcmSwitchEgressPktAge 

Chip-wide egress packet age time, msec.

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicSampleRate 

Number of times average port egressed bytes and queued bytes are computed in a second

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicEgressBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of port egressed bytes

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicQueuedBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of port queued bytes

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicEgressBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the average port egressed bytes is updated with the sampled value if the sampled value is less than the average

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicQueuedBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the average port queued bytes is updated with the sampled value if the sampled value is less than the average

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicEgressBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize average port egressed bytes

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicEgressBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize average port egressed bytes

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicQueuedBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize average port queued bytes

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicQueuedBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize average port queued bytes

bcmSwitchMacLowPower 

Enable switch low power mode and set the low power frequency, Khz

bcmSwitchCongestionCntag 

Enable/Disable CN-TAG processing

bcmSwitchCongestionCntagEthertype 

EtherType for CN-TAG

bcmSwitchCongestionCnm 

Enable/Disable congestion notification message handling

bcmSwitchCongestionCnmEthertype 

EtherType for congestion notification message

bcmSwitchCongestionNotificationIdHigh 

Device identifier for contructing congestion point identifier

bcmSwitchCongestionNotificationIdLow 

Port identifier for constructing congestion point identifier

bcmSwitchCongestionNotificationIdQueue 

Queue mode of the congestion point identifier. When set to 0 use congestion managed queue id, otherwise use queue number

bcmSwitchCongestionUseOuterTpid 

Outer TPID to be used for congestion notification message

bcmSwitchCongestionUseOuterVlan 

Outer vlan to be used for congestion notification message

bcmSwitchCongestionUseOuterPktPri 

Outer priority to be used for congestion notification message

bcmSwitchCongestionUseOuterCfi 

Outer CFI to be used for congestion notification message

bcmSwitchCongestionUseInnerPktPri 

Inner priority to be used for congestion notification message

bcmSwitchCongestionUseInnerCfi 

Inner CFI to be used for congestion notification message

bcmSwitchCongestionMissingCntag 

Choose the CNM generation behavior when congestion notification threshold is reached but the incoming sampled packet does not have CN-TAG

bcmSwitchCongestionExcludeReplications 

Take the replicated packets in account during the congestion test

bcmSwitchMiMDefaultSVP 

Enable MiM termination lookup miss packets to be forwarded using default SVP

bcmSwitchMiMDefaultSVPValue 

Default SVP for Mac-in-Mac

bcmSwitchEgressDroppedReportZeroLength 

Enable egress pipeline to report zero length for dropped packets

bcmSwitchLoadBalanceHashSelect 

Selects which hash function to use for Load Balance computation

bcmSwitchTrillEthertype 

Set TRILL EtherType field. Value of uint16 type

bcmSwitchTrillISISEthertype 

Set TRILL ISIS EtherType field. Value of uint16 type

bcmSwitchTrillISISDestMacOui 

Set TRILL All_ISIS_Rbridge MAC upper 3 bytes to match.

bcmSwitchTrillBroadcastDestMacOui 

Set TRILL ALL_Rbridge MAC upper 3 bytes to match.

bcmSwitchTrillEndStationDestMacOui 

Set TRILL ALL_ESADI MAC upper 3 bytes to match.

bcmSwitchTrillISISDestMacNonOui 

Set TRILL ALL_ISIS_Rbridge MAC lower 3 bytes to match.

bcmSwitchTrillBroadcastDestMacNonOui 

Set TRILL ALL_Rbridge MAC lower 3 bytes to match.

bcmSwitchTrillEndStationDestMacNonOui 

Set TRILL ALL_ESADI MAC lower 3 bytes to match.

bcmSwitchTrillMinTtl 

Set minimum TTL for Egress and Transit TRILL Rbridge.

bcmSwitchTrillTtlCheckEnable 

Enable TTL check for Egress TRILL Rbridge.

bcmSwitchTrillTtlErrToCpu 

Copy TRILL TTL failure packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchTrillHeaderErrToCpu 

Copy TRILL Header Error frame to CPU.

bcmSwitchTrillMismatchToCpu 

Copy TRILL mismatch error frame to CPU.

bcmSwitchTrillNameMissToCpu 

Copy TRILL Rbridge lookup failure to CPU.

bcmSwitchTrillRpfFailToCpu 

Copy TRILL RPF check fail to CPU.

bcmSwitchTrillOptionsToCpu 

Copy header Options to CPU.

bcmSwitchTrillNameErrDrop 

Set Drop setting for TRILL packets with Ingress-name equal to Egress-name.

bcmSwitchTrillRpfFailDrop 

Set Drop setting for TRILL multicast packets that fail RPF check.

bcmSwitchTrillHeaderVersionErrDrop 

Set Drop Setting for TRILL frames received with a non-zero Version field.

bcmSwitchTrillNameMissDrop 

Set Drop setting for TRILL Ingress RBridge nickname lookup failure.

bcmSwitchTrillAdjacencyFailDrop 

Set Drop setting for TRILL adjacency failure.

bcmSwitchTrillHeaderErrDrop 

Set Drop Setting for TRILL header error.

bcmSwitchUdpPktActionEnable 

Enable additional actions for UDP packets

bcmSwitchUdpPktRedirectPbmp 

Replace the destination port bitmap of UDP packets

bcmSwitchUdpPktCopyToPbmp 

Add the destination port bitmap of UDP packets

bcmSwitchUdpPktNewTc 

Change the Traffic Class value of UDP packets

bcmSwitchL3TunnelIpV4ModeOnly 

Set L3 Tunnel to IPV4 mode only

bcmSwitchL3SrcHitEnable 

Enables/Disables source hit bit lookup update in the L3 table

bcmSwitchL2DstHitEnable 

Enables/Disables destination hit bit lookup update in the L2 table

bcmSwitchWESPProtocolEnable 

Enables/Disables parsing into WESP payload

bcmSwitchWESPProtocol 

WESP protocol number

bcmSwitchDeprecated614 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchIp6CompressEnable 

Enables/Disables IPv6 compression support in the VFP table

bcmSwitchIp6CompressDefaultOffset 

Set the offset value used to extract 26-bits from the IPv6 address field of IPv6 packet

bcmSwitchStableSaveLongIds 

When saving FP information to storage for level-2 warm boot, save full entity ids (i.e. not compact)

bcmSwitchGportAnyDefaultL2Learn 

Set default cml_value for Any Gport type.

bcmSwitchGportAnyDefaultL2Move 

Set default cml_station_move value for Any Gport type

bcmSwitchIngParseL2TunnelTermDipSipSelect 

Controls the values used to populate the DIP+SIP containers for L2-tunnel-terminated packets

bcmSwitchIngParseL3L4IPv4 

Enable parsing of IPv4 L3/L4 headers

bcmSwitchIngParseL3L4IPv6 

Enable parsing of IPv6 L3/L4 headers

bcmSwitchL2LearnMode 

Learning Mode

bcmSwitchSetWredJitterMask 

Set WRED Jitter value

bcmSwitchSetMplsEntropyLabelTtl

bcmSwitchSetMplsEntropyLabelPri

bcmSwitchSetMplsEntropyLabelOffset

bcmSwitchPonOamFailsafeState 

Enables/Disables MPCP fail safe

bcmSwitchEquipmentAlarmState 

Set equipment alarm report state

bcmSwitchPowerAlarmState 

Set power alarm report state

bcmSwitchBatteryMissingAlarmState 

Set battery missing alarm report state

bcmSwitchBatteryFailureAlarmState 

Set battery failure alarm report state

bcmSwitchBatteryVoltLowAlarmState 

Set battery volt low alarm report state

bcmSwitchBatteryVoltLowAlarmClearThreshold

bcmSwitchSelfTestFailureAlarmState

bcmSwitchL3IngressInterfaceMapSet

bcmSwitchMplsPWControlWordToCpu 

Enable MPLS packets with PWACH control word, to be copied to CPU

bcmSwitchMplsPWControlTypeToCpu

bcmSwitchMplsPWCountPktsAll 

Enable count-all MPLS packets arriving on PWs

bcmSwitchEntropyHashSet0Offset 

Selection for MPLS-Entropy-Label hash bits.

bcmSwitchEntropyHashSet1Offset 

Selection for MPLS-Entropy-Label hash bits.

bcmSwitchArpRequestMyStationIPToCPU 

APR reply packets with My IP address should be sent to CPU.

bcmSwitchArpRequestMyStationIPDrop 

APR reply packets with My IP address should be dropped.

bcmSwitchArpRequestMyStationIPFwd 

APR reply packets with given IP address should not trapped/dropped.

bcmSwitchL3SIPMoveToCpu 
bcmSwitchTrunkHashSrcPortEnable 

BCM886XX: Make Source port part of the hash.

bcmSwitchTrunkHashOffset 

BCM886XX: Hash key is barrel shifted by this value

bcmSwitchTrunkHashMPLSLabelBOS 

In an mpls label stack, look for label with bottom of stack bit set. Valid values see BCM_HASH_MPLS_LABEL_BOS_

bcmSwitchTrunkHashMPLSPWControlWord 

BCM886XX: Indicates control word is present at end of MPLS headers.

bcmSwitchTrunkHashSeed 

BCM886XX: Initial seed value for trunk hashing.

bcmSwitchTrunkHashConfig 

BCM886XX: Selects hashing polynomial.

bcmSwitchTrunkHashPktHeaderCount 

BCM886XX: Number of headers to consider in hashing.

bcmSwitchTrunkHashPktHeaderSelect 

BCM886XX: Selects which starting header to use for hashing.

bcmSwitchECMPHashSrcPortEnable 

BCM886XX: Make Source port part of the ECMP hash.

bcmSwitchECMPHashOffset 

BCM886XX: ECMP Hash key is barrel shifted by this value.

bcmSwitchECMPHashSeed 

BCM886XX: Initial seed value for ECMP hashing.

bcmSwitchECMPHashConfig 

BCM886XX: Selects hashing polynomial for ECMP.

bcmSwitchECMPHashPktHeaderCount 

BCM886XX: Number of headers to consider in ECMP hashing.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicHashOffset 

Enhanced hash selections for trunk dynamic load balancing.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicSampleRate 

Number of times historical member load and queued bytes are computed in a second

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicAccountingSelect 

0 = physical link accounting, 1 = virtual link accounting

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicEgressBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of historical member load. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicQueuedBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of historical member queued bytes. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicEgressBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the historical member load is reset to the instantaneous value if the latter is smaller. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicQueuedBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the historical member queued bytes is updated with the instantaneous value if the latter is smaller. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicEgressBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize historical member load. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicEgressBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize historical member load. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicQueuedBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member queued bytes. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicQueuedBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member queued bytes. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicExpectedLoadMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize historical and instantaneous expected member load. Applicable to virtual link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicExpectedLoadMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize historical and instantaneous expected member load. Applicable to virtual link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicImbalanceMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in percentage, used to quantize historical and instantaneous member load imbalance. Applicable to virtual link accounting.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicImbalanceMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in percentage, used to quantize historical and instantaneous member load imbalance. Applicable to virtual link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicHashOffset 

Enhanced hash selections for L3 ECMP dynamic load balancing.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicSampleRate 

Number of times historical member load and queued bytes are computed in a second

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicAccountingSelect 

0 = physical link accounting, 1 = virtual link accounting

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicEgressBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of historical member load. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicQueuedBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of historical member queued bytes. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicEgressBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the historical member load is reset to the instantaneous value if the latter is smaller. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicQueuedBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the historical member queued bytes is updated with the instantaneous value if the latter is smaller. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicEgressBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize historical member load. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicEgressBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize historical member load. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicQueuedBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member queued bytes. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicQueuedBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member queued bytes. Applicable to physical link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicExpectedLoadMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize historical and instantaneous expected member load. Applicable to virtual link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicExpectedLoadMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in mbps, used to quantize historical and instantaneous expected member load. Applicable to virtual link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicImbalanceMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in percentage, used to quantize historical and instantaneous member load imbalance. Applicable to virtual link accounting.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicImbalanceMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in percentage, used to quantize historical and instantaneous member load imbalance. Applicable to virtual link accounting.

bcmSwitchFailoverDropToCpu 

Protection data drop to CPU enable.

bcmSwitchMplsReservedEntropyLabelToCpu 

Packet is copied to the CPU if the entropy label falls between the reserved range (0-15).

bcmSwitchL3SrcBindMissToCpu 

Send a copy of L3 packet to CPU if SIP lookup fails in HPAE mode.

bcmSwitchMplsGalAlertLabelToCpu 

When a GAL label is exposed in a packet, such a packet will be dropped. This control determines whether such a packet gets copied to CPU.

bcmSwitchMplsRalAlertLabelToCpu 

When a RAL label is exposed in a packet, such a packet will be dropped. This control determines whether such a packet gets copied to CPU.

bcmSwitchMplsIllegalReservedLabelToCpu 

Exposed an illegal reserved label to CPU. For example, exposed GAL Label has BOS=0.

bcmSwitchMplsLookupsExceededToCpu 

Expose out of lookups to CPU

bcmSwitchMplsUnknownAchTypeToCpu 

Packet has an unknown ACH Type.

bcmSwitchMplsUnknownAchVersionToCpu 

The version number of ACH is not 1.

bcmSwitchTimesyncIngressVersion 

Ingress 1588 version 0:V2 1:>V2.

bcmSwitchTimesyncEgressVersion 

Egress 1588 version 0:V2 1:>V2.

bcmSwitchTimesyncUnknownVersionToCpu 

The version number is not recognized.

bcmSwitchCongestionCnmToCpu 

Send ICNM packets to the CPU. (Deprecated)

bcmSwtichCongestionCnmProxyErrorToCpu 

Enable forwarding to CPU.

bcmSwtichCongestionCnmProxyToCpu 

This is to copy the dropped CNM packet to CPU if a network administrator needs to look at them.

bcmSwitchWlanTunnelErrorDrop 

WLAN Decryption offload enable.

bcmSwitchMplsReservedEntropyLabelDrop 

When the value of the received entropy label falls in the reserved range(0-15), this control will determine if the packet is dropped or not.

bcmSwitchRemoteProtectionTrust 

If set, use the Protection Status bit in the received HiGig Header.

bcmSwitchL2GreProtocolType 

Set protocol-type for L2-GRE

bcmSwitchL2GreVpnIdSizeSet 

Set bit-size of VPNID within L2-GRE key

bcmSwitchL2GreVpnIdMissToCpu 

If set, send a copy of L2GRE packet to CPU if VPNID lookup fails.

bcmSwitchL2GreTunnelMissToCpu 

If set, send a copy of L2GRE packet to CPU if SIP lookup fails.

bcmSwitchMultipathCompressBuffer 

Set the size of the L3 ECMP table defragmentation buffer.

bcmSwitchMultipathCompress 

Defragment L3 ECMP table.

bcmSwitchBstEnable 

Enable BST tracking.

bcmSwitchBstTrackingMode 

BST resource usage tracking mode.

bcmSwitchL3McastL2 

if set to 0 then l2 key is <VID, DA>, if set to 1 then l2 key is <RIF/VID, DIP>.

bcmSwitchMiMTeBvidLowerRange 

Configure the lower limit for Traffic engineered BVID

bcmSwitchMiMTeBvidUpperRange 

Configure the upper limit for Traffic engineered BVID

bcmSwitchRemoteEncapsulationMode 

If set, all packet replication is performed on a remote device. Required egress encapsulation is indicated by the HiGig2 header.

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkAutoIncludeDisable 

If set, disable automatic inclusion of other members of a HiGig trunk group when one member is specified as the steering destination for a remote module.

bcmSwitchTrunkHashNormalize 

Enables using same hash in both directions of a flow. Applies to both MAC/IP addresses

bcmSwitchMplsLabelCache 

Enable Mpls Label Cache

bcmSwitchMplsLabelCommit 

Commit the MPLS Label Database to hardware

bcmSwitchTrillHopCount 

Trill hop count

bcmSwitchPolicerFairness 

if set, packet is considered in profile if bucket-level plus random value are above packet-size. If not set, packet is considered in profile if bucket-level is above packet-size.

bcmSwitchVxlanUdpDestPortSet 

Set UDP Destination port for VXLAN

bcmSwitchVxlanEntropyEnable 

Set UDP Source port for VXLAN Tunnel Entropy(Value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmSwitchVxlanVnIdMissToCpu 

Set VXLAN VN_ID lookup failure Copy to CPU

bcmSwitchVxlanTunnelMissToCpu 

If set, send a copy of VXLAN packet to CPU if VXLAN Tunnel lookup fails.

bcmSwitchECMPVxlanHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for VxLAN ECMP hashing .

bcmSwitchECMPL2GreHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for L2Gre ECMP hashing .

bcmSwitchECMPTrillHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for Trill ECMP hashing .

bcmSwitchECMPMplsHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for Mpls ECMP hashing .

bcmSwitchVirtualPortDynamicHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for Virtual Port Aggregation.

bcmSwitchTMDomain 

Device TM-Domain.

bcmSwitchPortHeaderType 

Sets TM Port header type.

bcmSwitchL2OverflowEvent 

Enable/Disable L2 overflow event processing.

bcmSwitchLinkProvClear 

Automatically clear provision for a link when it is de-registered.

bcmSwitchEtagEthertype 

Set EtherType field in ETAG

bcmSwitchEtagInvalidToCpu 

Invalid ETAG to CPU

bcmSwitchEtagDropToCpu 

Packets dropped due to ETAG present to CPU. Enable/disable or set specific system port gport.

bcmSwitchNonEtagDropToCpu 

Packets dropped due to ETAG not present to CPU

bcmSwitchExtenderRpfFailToCpu 

Extender RPF check fail to CPU

bcmSwitchExtenderInterfaceMissToCpu 

Extender forwarding lookup miss to CPU

bcmSwitchPrioDropToCpu 

Priority admittance drop to CPU

bcmSwitchExtenderMulticastLowerThreshold 

Lower threshold of multicast extended port VID

bcmSwitchExtenderMulticastHigherThreshold 

Higher threshold of multicast extended port VID

bcmSwitchL3NATEnable 

Enable/Disable NAT on the switch.

bcmSwitchL3DNATHairpinToCpu 

If set send copy of DNAT hairpin packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchL3DNATMissToCpu 

If set send copy of DNAT lookup miss packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchL3SNATMissToCpu 

If set send copy of SNAT lookup miss packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchL3NatOtherToCpu 

If set send copy of realm crossing non-TCP, UDP or ICMP packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchL3NatRealmCrossingIcmpToCpu 

If set send copy of realm crossing ICMP packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchL3NatFragmentsToCpu 

If set send copy of NAT fragment packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchHashL3DNATPool 

Hash Select for DNAT address type entry.

bcmSwitchHashL3DNATPoolDual 

Secondary Hash Select for DNAT address type entry.

bcmSwitchMcastTrunkHashMin 

Minimal hushing value for a copy with a given port as destination. Copies with lower Hash values will be dropped.

bcmSwitchMcastTrunkHashMax 

Maximal hushing value for a copy with a given port as destination. Copies with higher Hash values will be dropped.

bcmSwitchIp4Compress 

compress IPv4 routing table.

bcmSwitchEcmpResilientHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for ECMP resilient hashing .

bcmSwitchTrunkResilientHashOffset 

Barrel shift the resilient hashing LAG key.

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkResilientHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for HiGig trunk resilient hashing .

bcmSwitchShaperAdjust 

Meter/Rate control with overhead on wire accounted for per packet for EFP.

bcmSwitchHashVpVlanMemberIngress 

Select Hash algorithm for ingress vp vlan membership check.

bcmSwitchHashVpVlanMemberIngressDual 

Select secondary Hash algorithm for ingress vp vlan membership check.

bcmSwitchHashVpVlanMemberEgress 

Select Hash algorithm for Egress vp vlan membership check.

bcmSwitchHashVpVlanMemberEgressDual 

Select secondary Hash algorithm for Egress vp vlan membership check.

bcmSwitchHashL2Endpoint 

Select hash algorithm for L2 Endpoint table.

bcmSwitchHashL2EndpointDual 

Select secondary hash algorithm for L2 Endpoint table.

bcmSwitchHashEndpointQueueMap 

Select hash algorithm for Endpoint Queue Map table.

bcmSwitchHashEndpointQueueMapDual 

Select secondary hash algorithm for Endpoint Queue Map table.

bcmSwitchStackRouteHistoryBitmap1 

Configures Stacking route history bitmap stamping according to port profile number 1. Uses for packet pruning in Stacking system.

bcmSwitchStackRouteHistoryBitmap2 

Configures Stacking route history bitmap stamping according to port profile number 2. Uses for packet pruning in Stacking system.

bcmSwitchArpIPcheck 

For ARP request, check if TPA is known.

bcmSwitchDeprecated778 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchDeprecated779 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchL2LearnLimitToCpu 

Copy the frame to CPU once the learn limitation occurred due to the hash is full in L2 Table.

bcmSwitchFlexibleMirrorDestinations 

Enable configuration of the maximum number of mirror destinations.

bcmSwitchEcmpMacroFlowHashEnable 

Enable ECMP macro-flow hashing.

bcmSwitchOamVersionCheckDisable 

Disable version check for OAM packets in pipeline.

bcmSwitchOamOlpChipEtherType 

Ether Type to be used for OLP Chip communication.

bcmSwitchOamOlpChipTpid 

TPID to be used for OLP Chip communication.

bcmSwitchOamOlpChipVlan 

VLAN ID to be used for OLP Chip communication.

bcmSwitchDeprecated787 

Deprecated. Do not use.

bcmSwitchEgressKeepSystemHeader 

Keep system headers on Tx packets for a given port.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowEcmpHashConcatEnable 

Enable hash concatenation for ecmp macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowLoadBalanceHashConcatEnable 

Enable hash concatenation for Load balance macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkHashConcatEnable 

Enable hash concatenation for Trunk macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkHashConcatEnable 

Enable hash concatenation for HiGig Trunk macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowECMPHashSeed 

Set Hash seed for ecmp macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowLoadBalanceHashSeed 

Set Hash Seed for Load balance macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkHashSeed 

Set Hash Seed for Trunk macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkHashSeed 

Set Hash Seed for HiGig Trunk macro flow.

bcmSwitchHashTrillPayloadSelect0 

Set hash control to select TRILL payload L2/L3 fields for Hash Block A.

bcmSwitchHashTrillPayloadSelect1 

Set hash control to select TRILL payload L2/L3 fields for Hash Block B.

bcmSwitchHashTrillTunnelSelect0 

Set hash control to select TRILL Tunnel L2/L3 fields for Hash Block A.

bcmSwitchHashTrillTunnelSelect1 

Set hash control to select TRILL Tunnel L2/L3 fields for Hash Block B.

Hash Control to collapse IPV6 addresses for hash block A.

bcmSwitchHashIP6AddrCollapseSelect1 

Hash Control to collapse IPV6 addresses for hash block B.

bcmSwitchPrependTagEnable 

Enable Prepend tag per Port.

bcmSwitchHashL2VxlanField0 

Hash A Selection of L2 Payload for Vxlan Packets

bcmSwitchHashL2VxlanField1 

Hash B Selection of L2 Payload for Vxlan Packets

Hash A Selection of L3 Payload for Vxlan Packets

bcmSwitchHashL3VxlanField1 

Hash B Selection of L3 Payload for Vxlan Packets

Hash A Selection of L2 Payload for L2Gre Packets

bcmSwitchHashL2L2GreField1 

Hash B Selection of L2 Payload for L2Gre Packets

bcmSwitchHashL3L2GreField0 

Hash A Selection of L3 Payload for L2Gre Packets

bcmSwitchHashL3L2GreField1 

Hash B Selection of L3 Payload for L2Gre Packets

bcmSwitchMcastTrunkIngressCommit 

If set, the Multicast LAG packets use the new LAG table definition for the member resolution.

bcmSwitchMcastTrunkEgressCommit 

If set, the new Multicast LAG table is copied to the old one. It assumes that all the devices are using the new LAG table, after calling bcmSwitchMcastTrunkIngressCommit.

bcmSwitchMplsShortPipe 

If Set device supports Short pipe only. Otherwise Pipe only.

bcmSwitchTraverseMode 

Control the traverse mode, choose mode from bcm_switch_table_update_mode_t

bcmSwitchTrunkResilientHashConfig 

Stateful LAG hashing function

bcmSwitchTrunkResilientHashSeed 

Stateful LAG hashing seed

bcmSwitchECMPResilientHashSeed 

Stateful ECMP hashing seed

bcmSwitchResilientHashAgeTimer 

Resilient hash entry deletion time. Units: seconds

bcmSwitchFieldStageEgressToCpu 

Control to enable egress copy to CPU action

bcmSwitchHashOamEgress 

Hash Select for egress OAM.

bcmSwitchHashOamEgressDual 

Secondary Hash Select for egress OAM.

bcmSwitchColorL3L2Marking 

Set the DP->Resolved-DP map (COS marking)

bcmSwitchWredForAllPkts 

Apply WRED per color profiles on all packets

bcmSwitchFcoeNpvModeEnable 

NPV mode

bcmSwitchFcoeDomainRoutePrefixLength 

D-ID Bits to use for domain route search

bcmSwitchFcoeCutThroughEnable 

Enables Cut-Through mode for FCOE packets

bcmSwitchFcoeSourceBindCheckAction 

Sets the action to take when Source-bind-check fails

bcmSwitchFcoeSourceFpmaPrefixCheckAction 

Sets the action to take when Source-fpma-prefix-check fails

bcmSwitchFcoeVftHopCountExpiryToCpu 

If set, copy hopcount expired packets to CPU

bcmSwitchFcoeVftHopCountExpiryAction 

If set, send hopcount expired packets with EOFni in FC trailer. Applicable at egress.

bcmSwitchFcoeFcEofT1Value 

Sets the numerical value for EOFt

bcmSwitchFcoeFcEofT2Value 

Sets the numerical value for EOFt (alternate)

bcmSwitchFcoeFcEofA1Value 

Sets the numerical value for EOFa

bcmSwitchFcoeFcEofA2Value 

Sets the numerical value for EOFa (alternate)

bcmSwitchFcoeFcEofN1Value 

Sets the numerical value for EOFn

bcmSwitchFcoeFcEofN2Value 

Sets the numerical value for EOFn (alternate)

bcmSwitchFcoeFcEofNI1Value 

Sets the numerical value for EOFni

bcmSwitchFcoeFcEofNI2Value 

Sets the numerical value for EOFni (alternate)

bcmSwitchFcoeZoneCheckFailToCpu 

Action to take when FCOE zone check fails, 0 : no-op(default), 1 : Copy-to-CPU

bcmSwitchFcoeZoneCheckMissDrop 

Action to take when FCOE zone check is a miss, 0 : no-op, 1 : Drop(default)

bcmSwitchHashUseL2GreTunnelGreKey0 

Place the GRE key extracted from L2GRE pkt header in Hash A buckets

bcmSwitchHashUseL2GreTunnelGreKey1 

Place the GRE key extracted from L2GRE pkt header in Hash B buckets

bcmSwitchHashL2GrePayloadSelect0 

Select inner L2/L3 fields to derive the Hash A buckets when an L2GRE pkt is received and the L2GRE tunnel is being terminated

bcmSwitchHashL2GrePayloadSelect1 

Select inner L2/L3 fields to derive the Hash B buckets when an L2GRE pkt is received and the L2GRE tunnel is being terminated

bcmSwitchHashL2GreNetworkPortPayloadDisable0 

Disable using the l2gre payload for hashing, for L2Gre pkts

bcmSwitchHashL2GreNetworkPortPayloadDisable1 

Disable using the l2gre payload for hashing, for L2Gre pkts

bcmSwitchSystemReservedVlan 

System Reserved VLAN

bcmSwitchProxySrcKnockout 

If set, remove the source port during a proxy lookup operation of a packet which originated on this module.

bcmSwitchNetworkGroupDepth 

Number of split horizon groups supported by the device

bcmSwitchUnknownSubportPktTagToCpu 

If set, send packet to CPU on following error conditions a. missing subport pkt tag and b. unknown subport pkt tag (lookup miss).

bcmSwitchL3RoutedLearn 

enable L2 learning for routed packets.

bcmSwitchSubportPktTagEthertype 

Set EtherType field in LLTAG

bcmSwitchSubportPktTagToCpu 

LLTAG present to CPU

bcmSwitchNonSubportPktTagToCpu 

LLTAG not present to CPU

bcmSwitchHashL2GreKeyMask1 

Set the mask which is AND-ed with hash L2GRE key before hash generation for hash B

bcmSwitchL3Max128BV6Entries 

Max number of Number of 128B LPM entries.

bcmSwitchEEEQueueThresholdProfile1 

Set EEE BB mode queue depth threshold Profile 1

bcmSwitchEEEQueueThresholdProfile2 

Set EEE BB mode queue depth threshold Profile 2

bcmSwitchEEEQueueThresholdProfile3 

Set EEE BB mode queue depth threshold Profile 3

bcmSwitchEEEPacketLatencyProfile1

bcmSwitchEEEPacketLatencyProfile2

bcmSwitchDosAttackV6MinFragSize

bcmSwitchMirrorMulticastCosq

bcmSwitchMcQueueSchedMode

bcmSwitchReserved872 

Reserved.

bcmSwitchCacheTableUpdateAll 

Update all cached memories.

bcmSwitchHashNivSrcIfEtagSvidSelect0 

Select VN-TAG.src_vif or E-Tag.svid for hashing computation in Hash A buckets.

bcmSwitchHashNivSrcIfEtagSvidSelect1 

Select VN-TAG.src_vif or E-Tag.svid for hashing computation in Hash B buckets.

bcmSwitchHashNivDstIfEtagVidSelect0 

Select VN-TAG.dst_vif or E-Tag.vid for hashing computation in Hash A buckets.

bcmSwitchHashNivDstIfEtagVidSelect1 

Select VN-TAG.dst_vif or E-Tag.vid for hashing computation in Hash B buckets.

bcmSwitchBstSnapshotEnable 

BST resource usage SnapShot mode.

bcmSwitchSymmetricHashControl 

Enable/Disable symmetric hash, for Ip4, Ip6, FCoE packet, etc.

bcmSwitchL2ExtLearn 

Learn L2 addresses on EXT_L2_ENTRY

bcmSwitchReserveHighTunnelId 

Set the highest inclusive bounds of the Tunnel ID resources. Get will return the highest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

bcmSwitchReserveLowTunnelId 

Set the lower inclusive bounds of the Tunnel ID resources. Get will return the lowest value supported by the device. Setting 0 will remove the reserved range

bcmSwitchHigigCongestionClassEnable 

Enable the Congestion_Class field in HIGIG2 header to store the int_cn value in it.

bcmSwitchEcnNonIpResponsive 

Set the default responsive indication value for NON-IP packets.

bcmSwitchEcnNonIpIntCongestionNotification 

Set the internal congestion notification (int_cn) value for NON-IP packets.

bcmSwitchMimPayloadTpidEnable 

Indicates which of MPLS_TPID[3:0] are allowed to match the TPID of a transit MinM frame's payload L2 header's outer VLAN tag.

bcmSwitchHashMimUseTunnelHeader0 

Indicates whether the tunnel or payload fields must be used for hashing for MIM traffic in field selection block A.

bcmSwitchHashMimUseTunnelHeader1 

Indicates whether the tunnel or payload fields must be used for hashing for MIM traffic in field selection block B.

bcmSwitchMplsPipeTunnelLabelExpSet 

If set, MPLS pipe modes is supported with EXP field set. In this case exp is taken from the exp field in bcm_mpls_egress_label_s struct in the bcm_mpls_port_add api. Otherwise EXP field will be copied from previous label. Default is 0.

bcmSwitchControlPortConfigInstall 

Port config install.

bcmSwitchLoopbackMtuSize 

MTU size in bytes check for packets ingressed on loopback port.

bcmSwitchHashVxlanPayloadSelect0 

Set hash control to select VXLAN payload L2/L3 fields for Hash Block A.

bcmSwitchHashVxlanPayloadSelect1 

Set hash control to select VXLAN payload L2/L3 fields for Hash Block B.

bcmSwitchCongestionCnmSrcMacNonOui 

Source MAC address in Congestion Notification Message Lower 3 bytes of MAC address to match

bcmSwitchCongestionCnmSrcMacOui 

Source MAC address in Congestion Notification Message Upper 3 bytes of MAC address to match

bcmSwitchHashL2MPLSPayloadSelect0 

Set hash control to select L2 MPLS payload L2/L3 fields for Hash Block A.

bcmSwitchHashL2MPLSPayloadSelect1 

Set hash control to select L2 MPLS payload L2/L3 fields for Hash Block B.

bcmSwitchHashL3L2MPLSField1

bcmSwitchHashIPSecSelect1

bcmSwitchECMPLevel1RandomSeed 

Seed for RNG used in ECMP Randomized Load Balancing (at Level1 in Two Level ECMP)

bcmSwitchECMPLevel2RandomSeed 

Seed for RNG used in ECMP Randomized Load Balancing at Level2 in Two Level ECMP

bcmSwitchTimesyncEgressTimestampingMode 

Selects 32bit or 48bit timestamping mode for 1588 packets.

bcmSwitchSubportCoEEtherType 

Set COE protocol ingress EtherType to match

bcmSwitchSubportEgressTpid 

The TPID to use when the bcmPortControlSubportTagSize is 4 Bytes

bcmSwitchSubportEgressWideTpid 

The TPID to use when the bcmPortControlSubportTagSize is 8 Bytes

bcmSwitchIpmcSameVlanPruningOverride 

Set to override the IPMC same vlan pruning

bcmSwitchSynchronousPortClockSourceValid 

Returns whether synchronous clock can be sucessfully recovered from the port, configured via bcmSwitchSynchronousPortClockSource

bcmSwitchSynchronousPortClockSourceBkupValid 

Returns whether synchronous clock is successfully recovered from the back up port, configured via bcmSwitchSynchronousPortClockSourceBkup

bcmSwitchRemoteProtectionEnable 

Set the Protection Status bit in HiGig Header

bcmSwitchMirrorExclusive 

Set Mirror exclusive behaviour between FP and Port

bcmSwitchEcnDelayMeasurementThreshold 

Set Ecn delay measurement threshold

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHashUseMSB 

If enable, use MSB for Macroflow based hashing

bcmSwitchMplsDefaultTtlCopy 

Default value that is used when sending a packet from AC to PWE and the push-profile is copy

bcmSwitchOamStackingSupport 

Use VC label field to carry OAM endpoint context to egress XGS switch

bcmSwitchHashOam 

Hash select for OAM tables

bcmSwitchHashOamDual 

Secondary hash select for OAM tables

bcmSwitchHashOamLeastFull 

Use least full bank in dual hash OAM tables

bcmSwitchHashDualMoveDepthOam 

Maximum moves in dual hash mode for OAM tables

bcmSwitchPortVlanTranslationAdvanced 

Enable Port Advanced default vlan Edit mode. 1 - enable, 0 - disable

bcmSwitchForwardingLayerMtuFilter 

EnableDisable Forwarding Layer filtering per header format

bcmSwitchLinkLayerMtuFilter 

EnableDisable Link Layer Filtering per header format

bcmSwitchForwardingLayerMtuSize 

Mtu size for Forwarding Layer Filtering

bcmSwitchLinkLayerMtuSize 

MTU size for Link Layer Filtering

bcmSwitchMimBvidInsertionControl 

If 0, BVID is inserted into the MiM packet if the destination virtual port(bcm_mim_port_t object) is a Network port (legacy behavior). If set to 1, BVID is inserted into the MiM packet if the egress_tunnel_vlan field of the corresponding bcm_mim_port_t object contains a valid vlan id (1 .. 4095)

bcmSwitchL2CpuDeleteEvent 

If enable, when SW initiates a DELETE operation to l2 table, SDK can get relative DELETE events from L2 Mode FIFO.

bcmSwitchL2LearnEvent 

If enable, when HW does a LEARN operation to l2 table, SDK can get relative LEARN events from L2 Mode FIFO.

bcmSwitchL2CpuAddEvent 

If enable, when SW initiates a INSERT operation to l2 table, SDK can get ADD events from L2 Mode FIFO.

bcmSwitchL2AgingEvent 

If enable, when HW does a AGE operation to l2 table , SDK can get AGE events from L2 Mode FIFO.

bcmSwitchUdfHashEnable 

Enable/Disable UDF hashing

bcmSwitchOlpMatchRule 

Set Match rule value that identifies OLP packets when copied to CPU.

bcmSwitchMplsExtendedLabelTtl 

Set the TTL of the new MPLS label created when using extended label feature.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHashOverlayMaxOffset 

Maximum offset value to be used in overlay ECMP offset table

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHashOverlayStrideOffset 

Offset increment to be used for populating overlay ECMP offset table.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHashOverlayMinOffset 

Minimum offset value to be used in overlay ECMP offset table

bcmSwitchMacroFlowEcmpHashOverlayConcatEnable 

Enable hash concatenation for overlay layer ecmp macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowECMPOverlayHashSeed 

Hash Seed value for the overlay ECMP calculation

bcmSwitchECMPOverlayHashOffset 

Offset selections for enhanced overlay L3 ECMP.

56960 Enable hash concatenation for ecmp level 2 macro flow.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowECMPUnderlayHashSeed 

56960 Set Hash seed for ecmp level 2 macro flow.

Enhanced hash select for VxLAN ECMP Level 2 hashing .

bcmSwitchECMPUnderlayL2GreHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for L2Gre ECMP Level 2 hashing .

bcmSwitchECMPUnderlayTrillHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for Trill ECMP Level 2 hashing .

bcmSwitchVirtualPortUnderlayDynamicHashOffset 

Enhanced hash select for Virtual Port Aggregation at Level 2.

bcmSwitchECMPUnderlayHashSet0Offset 

56960 enhanced hash bits for ECMP Level 2.

bcmSwitchSampleFlexRandomSeed 

Set sFlow Flex RNG seed

bcmSwitchNonUcVlanShapingEnable 

Enable/disable the ability of assigning single destination non-unicast traffic to service-based queues

bcmSwitchCustomHeaderEncapPriorityOffset 

Set the offset of the priority value in the encapsulated custom header

bcmSwitchIngCapwapEnable 

Enable or disable ingress CAPWAP parser.

bcmSwitchCapwapDataUdpDstPort 

UDP dest port number of CAPWAP data packet.

bcmSwitchCountCapwapPayloadBytesOnly 

If set, count only the CAPWAP's wireless payload bytes for CAPWAP data packets.

bcmSwitchOamOlpStationMacOui 

Specify OUI bytes of BCM device MAC address used during OLP communication and OLP PKT sig match

bcmSwitchOamOlpStationMacNonOui 

Specify NON OUI bytes of BCM device MAC address used during OLP communication and OLP PKT sig match

bcmSwitchReserved955 

Reserved955

bcmSwitchPFCDeadlockDetectionTimeInterval 

Set and Get the PFC detection time interval (0-100ms[default], 1-10ms).

bcmSwitchPFCDeadlockRecoveryAction 

Set and Get Recovery action to be performed in PFC deadlock recovery state. 0-Transmit Packets (Default), 1-Drop.

bcmSwitchRangeCheckersAPIType 

Setting this switch control to 0 allows to use only field APIs (bcm_field_range_XXX) and setting it to 1 allows to use only new range module APIs (bcm_range_XXX). Default value will be set to 0.

bcmSwitchReserved958 

Reserved958

bcmSwitchEcmpGroupMemberMode 

Set/get ECMP group mode

bcmSwitchMimlEncapInnerEthertype 

Set MIML-ETYPE (inner EtherType) field in MiML for encapsulation. Value of unit16 type.

bcmSwitchHashMiMPayloadSelect0 

Set hash control to select MiM L2/L3 payload fields for Hash Block A

bcmSwitchHashMiMPayloadSelect1 

Set hash control to select MiM L2/L3 payload fields for Hash Block B

bcmSwitchHashL3MiMField0 

L3 MiM enhanced hash field for Hash Block A

bcmSwitchHashL3MiMField1 

L3 MiM enhanced hash field for Hash Block B

bcmSwitchHashMPLSUseLabelStack 

If there are more than 3 labels, label stack (up to 5 labels) is used for hashing else Top 3 MPLS labels + payload IPV4/IPv6 fields will be selected for hashing

bcmSwitchHashMPLSExcludeGAL 

To exclude GAL label from hash computation

bcmSwitchRedirectBufferThresholdPriorityLow 

Set the buffer threshold limit for low priority redirected packets

bcmSwitchRedirectBufferThresholdPriorityMedium 

Set the buffer threshold limit for medium priority redirected packets

bcmSwitchRedirectBufferThresholdPriorityHigh 

Set the buffer threshold limit for high priority redirected packets

bcmSwitchFlexIP6ExtHdr 

Programmable value for user defined extension header 1 & 2.

bcmSwitchFlexIP6ExtHdrEgress 

Egress programmable value for user defined extension header 1 & 2.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelMplsEcmp 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for MPLS ECMP.

bcmSwitchV6L3SrcDstLocalLinkDropCancel 

Do not drop IPv6. It will override drop control bcmSwitchV6L3LocalLinkDrop if source and destination are local link.

bcmSwitchL3ClassIdForL2Enable 

Enable/Disable L3 Lookup to get classids based on DIP & SIP for L2 Switched packets.

bcmSwitchDropSobmhOnLinkDown 

Enable/Disable SOBMH blocking on link down egress port

bcmSwitchResilientHashCRC0ByteMask 

Set mask for CRC0 stateful hashing function in 2Byte resolution

bcmSwitchResilientHashCRC1ByteMask 

Set mask for CRC1 stateful hashing function in 2Byte resolution

bcmSwitchResilientHashCRC2ByteMask 

Set mask for CRC2 stateful hashing function in 2Byte resolution

bcmSwitchResilientHashCRC3ByteMask 

Set mask for CRC3 stateful hashing function in 2Byte resolution

bcmSwitchResilientHashCRCSeed 

Set seed for stateful CRC hashing functions

bcmSwitchECMPResilientHashKey0Shift 

Shift left the Stateful-Hashing-Lb-Key(47 bit) to create ECMP key-0

bcmSwitchECMPResilientHashKey1Shift 

Shift right the Stateful-Hashing-Lb-Key(47 bit) to create ECMP key-1

bcmSwitchVpnDetachPorts 

Set VPN destroy mode to either delete ports that are attached to the VSI or ignore them. Default: 1 - Destroy attached ports.

bcmSwitchClassL3L2Marking 

Set the In-Lif-Profile->Resolved-In-Lif-Profile map (In-Lif-Profile mapping

bcmSwitchL3L2MarkingMode 

Set the DP map mode

bcmSwitchSTPDisabledFieldBypass 

Disable FP when STP state is disabled.

bcmSwitchHashSctpL4Port 

To set that RTAG7 hashing can be performed on SCTP.

bcmSwitchReserved988 

Reserved988.

bcmSwitchGlobalTpidEnable 

Enable/Disable global TPIDs.

bcmSwitchECMPResilientHashCombine 

Combine both regular and resilient hashing for ECMP key.

bcmSwitchHashSetTflowMode 

enable/disable using hash offset b0/b1 regardless of th_tflow_enabled

bcmSwitchDowngrade 

set the switch for a downgrade in Warmboot

bcmSwitchHashELISearch 

Enable ELI search and the use of the EL label for LAG and ECMP load balancing.

bcmSwitchCrashRecoveryMode 

Determine the Crash recovery mode 0:off 1:API 2:on demand.

bcmSwitchCrCommit 

If woekinging in on demand CR, use this to trigger a commit.

bcmSwitchCrLastTransactionStatus 

Query after a crash if last transaction went through.

bcmSwitchCrCouldNotRecover 

Query after A crash if program succesfully recovered.

bcmSwitchHWL2Freeze 

Freeze/thaw L2 H/W activity.

bcmSwitchHashIP6NextHeaderUseExtensionHeader0 

Hash Control to select the IPv6 Next Header field for hash Block A. If set, use Extension Header, else use current Next Header field.

bcmSwitchHashIP6NextHeaderUseExtensionHeader1 

Hash Control to select the IPv6 Next Header field for hash Block B. If set, use Extension Header, else use current Next Header field.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelLbidNonUnicast 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for non-unicast LBID.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelLbidUnicast 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for unicast LBID.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelHigigTrunkNonUnicast 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for non-unicast HiGig Trunk.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelHigigTrunkUnicast 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for unicast HiGig Trunk.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelHigigTrunkFailover 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for HiGig Trunk Failover.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelTrunkNonUnicast 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for non-unicast Trunk.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelEntropy 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for Entropy.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelVxlanEcmp 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for VXLAN ECMP.

bcmSwitchDefaultNativeOutVlanPort 

Default native out VLAN Port.

bcmSwitchDefaultEgressVlanEditClassId 

Default Vlan Edit Class Id for Egress VLAN translation.

bcmSwitchGtpDetectEnable 

Enable/disable the capability for GTP packet detection.

bcmSwitchGtpHdrFirstByte 

Setup the value for GTP Header First Byte.

bcmSwitchGtpHdrFirstByteMask 

Setup the mask for GTP Header First Byte.

bcmSwitchHashGtpTeidEnable0 

Enable using the Tunnel endpoint id for hashing, for GTP pkts.

bcmSwitchHashGtpTeidEnable1 

Enable using the Tunnel endpoint id for hashing, for GTP pkts.

bcmSwitchEccSingleBitErrorEvent 

Enable/Disable 1bit ECC error reporting for all the memories which are protected by ECC logic and whose Parity/ECC error could only be corrected by H/W.

bcmSwitchHeaderCompensationPerPacket 

Set the header compensation of packets according to the MSBs of its CUD.

bcmSwitch3rdTagStampMode 

Set the 3rd tag stamping mode, 0:Dsiable, 1: Enable.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkHashMinOffset 

Minumum offset value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for HiGig Trunk

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkHashMaxOffset 

Maximum offset value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for HiGig Trunk

bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkHashStrideOffset 

Offset increment value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for HiGig Trunk

bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkHashMinOffset 

Minumum offset value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for Trunk

bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkHashMaxOffset 

Maximum offset value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for Trunk

bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkHashStrideOffset 

Offset increment value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for Trunk

bcmSwitchMacroFlowLoadBalanceEntropyHashMinOffset 

Minumum offset value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for Load Balance ID/Entropy

bcmSwitchMacroFlowLoadBalanceEntropyHashMaxOffset 

Maximum offset value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for Load Balance ID/Entropy

bcmSwitchMacroFlowLoadBalanceEntropyHashStrideOffset 

Offset increment value to be used in RTAG7 macroflow for Load Balance ID/Entropy

bcmSwitchCrTransactionStart 

If working in on demand CR, use this to start a new transaction.

bcmSwitchUdpTunnelIPv4DstPort 

UDP destination port for IPv4 encapsulation in UDP tunnel.

bcmSwitchUdpTunnelIPv6DstPort 

UDP destination port for IPv6 encapsulation in UDP tunnel.

bcmSwitchUdpTunnelMplsDstPort 

UDP destination port for MPLS encapsulation in UDP tunnel.

bcmSwitchECMPSecondHierHashOffset 

BCM88680: ECMP second hierarchy Hash key is barrel shifted by this value.

bcmSwitchECMPSecondHierHashConfig 

BCM88680: Selects hashing polynomial for the second hierarchy of the ECMP.

bcmSwitchIngressRateLimitMpps 

Limit ingress rate in Mega Packets Per Second.

bcmSwitchMirrorSnoopForwardOriginalWhenDropped 

When dropping the mirror and/or snoop packet copies due to FIFOs being full, do not drop the original (forward) copy

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the historical member bytes in physical queue is updated with the instantaneous value if the latter is smaller.

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the historical member bytes in physical queue is updated with the instantaneous value if the latter is smaller.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesExponent 

The exponent used in the calculation of exponentially weighted moving average of historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesDecreaseReset 

If set, the historical member bytes in physical queue is updated with the instantaneous value if the latter is smaller.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesMinThreshold 

The minimum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicPhysicalQueuedBytesMaxThreshold 

The maximum threshold, in bytes, used to quantize historical member bytes in physical queue.

bcmSwitchFabricTrunkDynamicRandomSeed 

Seed for RNG used in HiGig Trunk Dynamic Load Balancing

bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicRandomSeed 

Seed for RNG used in Trunk Dynamic Load Balancing

bcmSwitchEcmpDynamicRandomSeed 

Seed for RNG used in ECMP Dynamic Load Balancing

bcmSwitchHashMPLSExcludeReservedLabel 

To exclude all reserved labels from hash computation

bcmSwitchMplsNonIpPayloadDefaultEcn 

To set the default ECN for L2 MPLS termination flows for non-IP payloads

bcmSwitchECMPHashBitCountSelect 

To select the most significant bits of the 16-bit ECMP hash value before the modulo function

bcmSwitchEcnIpPayloadResponsive 

To set to use payload IP header's IP protocol field to determine responsive attribute of the packet for transiting tunnels

bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthExactMatch 

Maximum moves in multi hash mode for FPEM tables.

bcmSwitchCrAbort 

If working in on demand CR, use this to abort the current transaction.

bcmSwitchLIUdpSrcPortSet 

Set UDP source port for Lawful Interception tunnel.

bcmSwitchRoce1Ethertype 

Set l2 EtherType to match RoCEv1 packets.

bcmSwitchRoce2UdpDstPort 

Set udp dest port to match RoCEv2 packets.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelRoce2Ecmp 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for RoCEv2 ECMP.

bcmSwitchHashSelectControlExtended 

Extended hash field selection control

bcmSwitchHashField0Roce1FlowLabel 

Enable RoCEv1 GRH(Global Route Header) flow label for Block A Hash Field Selection.

bcmSwitchHashField1Roce1FlowLabel 

Enable RoCEv1 GRH(Global Route Header) flow label for Block B Hash Field Selection.

bcmSwitchHashField0Roce2FlowLabel 

Enable RoCEv2 IPv6 flow label for Block A Hash Field Selection.

bcmSwitchHashField1Roce2FlowLabel 

Enable RoCEv2 IPv6 flow label for Block B Hash Field Selection.

bcmSwitchHashRoce1Field0 

Hash block A field selection for RoCEv1 packets.

bcmSwitchHashRoce1Field1 

Hash block B field selection for RoCEv1 packets.

bcmSwitchHashRoce2IP4Field0 

Hash block A field selection for RoCEv2 IPv4 packets.

bcmSwitchHashRoce2IP4Field1 

Hash block B field selection for RoCEv2 IPv4 packets.

bcmSwitchHashRoce2IP6Field0 

Hash block A field selection for RoCEv2 IPv6 packets.

bcmSwitchHashRoce2IP6Field1 

Hash block B field selection for RoCEv2 IPv6 packets.

bcmSwitchEcmpRoce2HashOffset 

Enhanced hash selection for RoCEv2 ECMP port based hashing.

bcmSwitchVxlanUdpDestPortSet1 

Set UDP Destination port for VXLAN (alternate).

bcmSwitchVxlanEntropyEnableIP6 

Set IPv6 Flow Label for VXLAN Tunnel Entropy (Value = TRUE/FALSE).

bcmSwitchE2EFCReceiveDestMacOui 

E2EFC message MAC upper 3 bytes to match, only for E2EFC RX.

bcmSwitchE2EFCReceiveDestMacNonOui 

E2EFC message MAC lower 3 bytes to match, only for E2EFC RX.

bcmSwitchE2EFCReceiveEtherType 

E2EFC message EtherType/length to match, only for E2EFC RX.

bcmSwitchE2EFCReceiveOpcode 

E2EFC message opcode to match, only for E2EFC RX.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelEcmpOverlay 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for ECMP LEVEL 1.

bcmSwitchMplsSpeculativeNibbleMap 

Map first nibble after MPLS header to speculative next protocol.

bcmSwitchIpmcSameFwdDmnThreshold 

Set the threshold for 1:1 mapped VLANs and VPNs for IPMC packet flow for RIOT

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelVpTrunk 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for VP Trunk.

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelTrunkResilientHash 

Enable/Disable flow based hashing for Trunk RH.

bcmSwitchMeterMef10dot3Enable 

Enable meter mef 10.3 mode.

bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthVlanTranslate1 

Maximum moves in multi hash mode for vlan translate1 tables.

bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthVlanTranslate2 

Maximum moves in multi hash mode for vlan translate2 tables.

bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthEgressVlanTranslate1 

Maximum moves in multi hash mode for vlan egress translate1 tables.

bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthEgressVlanTranslate2 

Maximum moves in multi hash mode for vlan egress translate2 tables.

bcmSwitchIntL4DestPort1 

INT(Inband Network Telemetry) packet UDP destination port1.

bcmSwitchIntL4DestPort2 

INT packet UDP destination port2.

bcmSwitchIntProbeMarker1 

INT header ProbeMarker1.

bcmSwitchIntProbeMarker2 

INT header ProbeMarker2.

bcmSwitchIntVersion 

INT header version.

bcmSwitchIntRequestVectorValue 

INT header request vector.

bcmSwitchIntRequestVectorMask 

INT header request vector mask.

bcmSwitchIntSwitchId 

INT payload switch ID.

bcmSwitchIntEgressTimeDelta 

Time in nano-second that is added to current time stamp to adjust latency from EP to port.

bcmSwitchIntHopLimitCpuEnable 

Enable copy to CPU on hop limit condition.

bcmSwitchIntTurnAroundCpuEnable 

Enable copy to CPU on egress port as turnaround port.

bcmSwitchIntMaxPayloadLength 

INT max payload length. Only apply to devices using global value

bcmSwitchForwardLookupNotFoundTrap 

Set foward lookup not found Trap ID.

bcmSwitchEtherTypeCustom1 

Set Custom_1 Ethernet type.

bcmSwitchEtherTypeCustom2 

Set Custom_2 Ethernet type.

bcmSwitchL3LpmHitbitEnable 

Enable hit bit lookup update in the LPM table.

bcmSwitchMplsCtrlPktToCpu 

MPLS control packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchInvalidTpidToCpu 

Invalid tag protocol ID packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchFlowSelectMissToCpu 

Packets that miss flow selection to CPU.

bcmSwitchL3HdrMismatchToCpu 

L3 header mismatch packets to CPU.

bcmSwitchMeterTrafficClass 

Meter Traffic Class value mapped from internal Traffic Class

bcmSwitchRoeEthertype 

EtherType value for ROE frames after tunnel decap.

bcmSwitchRoeCustomEthertype 

EtherType value for ROE Custom frames after tunnel decap.

bcmSwitchRoeUdpDestPort 

Set UDP Destination port for ROE frames.

bcmSwitchRoeCustomUdpDestPort 

Set UDP Destination port for ROE Custom frames.

bcmSwitchOamOlpHeaderAdd 

Enable or disable OLP header addition to OAM packets copied to CPU. OLP header addition is enabled by default for OAM packets. Please note that Embedded applications such as Ethernet LM/DM and MPLS LM/DM will not work correctly if OLP header addition is disabled.

bcmSwitchL2FreezeMode 

Use global forward mode for higher efficiency or per port no learn mode if some ports shouldn't forward.

bcmSwitchL3McRpfDefaultRoute 

Enable SIP base MC RPF default route check.

bcmSwitchIngParseL2TunnelTermArp 

Enable parsing of payload ARP header for L2 tunnel terminated packets.

bcmSwitchIngParseL2TunnelTermRarp 

Enable parsing of payload RARP header for L2 tunnel terminated packets.

bcmSwitchNoneEthernetPacketMeterPtr 

Ethernet meter pointer for none Ethernet packets.

bcmSwitchEtherDscpRemark 

Enable copying IP header.TOS to In-DSCP-EXP.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFirstOption 

Configure TCP option number for switch control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSynOption. Only first option in the TCP option can be checked and compared to with this value.

bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFirstOption 

Configure Inner TCP option number for switch control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSynOption. Only first option in the TCP option can be checked and compared to with this value.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsMask 

Configure TCP control flags valid bits for Dos Attack. This value is used for generating Dos Attack for bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsZero and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsResvdNonZero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFlagsMask 

Configure Inner TCP control flags valid bits for Dos Attack. This value is used for generating Dos Attack for bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsZero and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsResvdNonZero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSR 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with SYN and RST Flags set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsZero 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet in which TCP Control Flag is Zero. Switch Control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsMask and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFlagsMask must be configured to determine valid TCP Flag bits.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSynOption 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with SYN Flag set and option number in payload. Switch Control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFirstOption and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFirstOption must be set required option number for matching.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSynFirstFrag 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with SYN Flags set in first fragment.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsFinNoAck 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with flags FIN set and ACK not set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsRstNoAck 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with flags RST set and ACK not set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsNoSFRA 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with no SYN, FIN, RST, ACK Flag set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsUrgNoUrgPtr 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with URG flag set and Null Urgent Pointer.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsNoUrgWithUrgPtr 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with URG flag not set and non-null Urgent Pointer.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpDstPortZero 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with Destination port as zero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpSrcPortZero 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with Source Port as zero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsResvdNonZero 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with Reserved flags non-zero. Switch Control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsMask and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFlagsMask must be configured to determine reserved flag bits.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpV4DstBcast 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with Ipv4 Broadcast DIP address.

bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsAck 

Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with ACK flag set and Acknowledgement number is zero.

bcmSwitchMirrorPsampFormat2Epoch 

Set EPOCH value in PSAMP format2 header

bcmSwitchL2StationExtendedMode 

Set L2 station extended memory global mode.

bcmSwitchHashSeed 

Set the seed of the selected hash function.

bcmSwitchLayerRecordModeSelection 

Select the working mode of the layer records.

bcmSwitchECMPThirdHierHashConfig 

Selects hashing polynomial for the third hierarchy of the ECMP.

bcmSwitchNwkHashConfig 

Selects hashing polynomial for the network load balancing key generation.

bcmSwitchMplsStack0HashSeed 

Set the seed of the first MPLS stack hash.

bcmSwitchMplsStack1HashSeed 

Set the seed of the second MPLS stack hash.

bcmSwitchParserHashSeed 

Set the seed of the parser stage hashing.

bcmSwitchMplsSpeculativeParse 

Enable/disable the MPLS speculative parsing.

bcmSwitchExternalTcamSync 

Enum for external TCAM sync.

bcmSwitchArpMyIp1

bcmSwitchArpMyIp2 

My-ARP trap configuration of IP 2.

bcmSwitchArpIgnoreDa 

ARP trap configuration of Ignore DA.

bcmSwitchNdpMyIp1

bcmSwitchNdpMyIp2 

My-NDP trap configuration of IP 2.

bcmSwitchIcmpIgnoreDa 

ICMP trap configuration of Ignore DA.

enable/disable VXLAN EVPN.

Maximum moves in dual hash mode for EGR_VP_VLAN_MEMBERSHIP table.

Set UDP Destination port for GPE.

bcmSwitchGeneveEntropyEnable 

Set UDP Source port for GENEVE Tunnel Entropy(Value = TRUE/FALSE).

bcmSwitchGeneveUdpDestPortSet 

Set UDP Destination port for GENEVE.

bcmSwitchBfdRxDisable 

Disable BFD Rx packet processing.

bcmSwitchDescCommit 

Commit descriptor DMA chain to HW.

bcmSwitchDlbMonitorIngressRandomSeed

bcmSwitchCounterAdjustEgressTm 

Counter compensation specifically for ETM.

bcmSwitchCounterAdjustEgressPp 

Counter compensation specifically for ERPP.

bcmSwitchTagPcpDeiSrc 

Set Source of PCP_DEi for SIT

bcmSwitchBfdMyDipDestination 

Set destination for BFD IP address forwarding.

bcmSwitchEndToEndLatencyPerDestinationPort 

Define if end to end latency is made per destination port or not.

bcmSwitchExternalTcamInit

bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthL3Tunnel 

Maximum moves in multi hash mode for L3 Tunnel tables.

bcmSwitchGbpEtherType

bcmSwitchGpeUdpSrcPortSelect 

Select UDP source port for GPE tunnel

Select UDP source port for GENEVE tunnel

bcmSwitchPreserveOtagBeforeItag 

Control for preserved OTAG order wrt. ITAG

bcmSwitchMirrorCpuCosq 

Mirror COS for CPU port as MTP

bcmSwitchIntProbeMarkerEnable 

INT packet ProbeMarker(UDF) parser Enable.

bcmSwitchIntL4DestPortEnable 

INT packet UDP destination port parser Enable.

bcmSwitchFtmhEtherType 

Set FTMH header EtherType to match

bcmSwitchGbpSidDidMcastLookupMissClassid

bcmSwitchCustomOuterEthertype1

bcmSwitchCustomOuterEthertype2

bcmSwitchCustomInnerEthertype1

bcmSwitchCustomInnerEthertype2

bcmSwitchCustomOuterProtocolId2

bcmSwitchCustomInnerProtocolId1

bcmSwitchCustomInnerProtocolId2

bcmSwitchCustomOuterUdpDstPort2

bcmSwitchCustomInnerUdpDstPort1

bcmSwitchCustomInnerUdpDstPort2

bcmSwitchReservedEgressNextHop

bcmSwitchSRV6ReducedModeEnable

bcmSwitchLlcHeaderControlMode 

When set vlaue=1 LLC header control bits located in 1:0 selected, value=0 bits 7:6 selected.

bcmSwitchPcieHotSwapDisable 

When set vlaue=1 PCIE Hot swap manager is disabled. Applicable for CMICX based devices only

bcmSwitchDosAttackMaxIpPayloadEnable 

Enable outer IP payload maximum size check. 1: enable, 0(default): disable.

bcmSwitchDosAttackMaxIpPayloadSize 

Maximum outer IP payload size value for outer IP payload maximum size check.

bcmSwitchDosAttackMinIpPayloadEnable 

Enable outer IP payload minimum size check. 1: enable, 0(default): disable.

bcmSwitchDosAttackMinIpPayloadSize

bcmSwitchDosAttackMaxInnerIpPayloadEnable

bcmSwitchDosAttackMinInnerIpPayloadSize

bcmSwitchMacroFlowEcmpDynamicHashMaxOffset 

Maximum offset value to be used in ECMP dynamic load balance offset table.

bcmSwitchMacroFlowEcmpDynamicHashStrideOffset 

Offset increment to be used for ECMP populating dynamic load balance offset table.

To specify the number of bits required in the final hash result for trunk unicast hash before the modulo function

bcmSwitchTrunkNonunicastHashBitCountSelect 

To specify the number of bits required in the final hash result for trunk non-unicast hash before the modulo function

◆ bcm_switch_dosattack_event_e

enum bcm_switch_dosattack_event_e

Switch Dos Attack Events.

Enumerator
bcmSwitchDosAttackEventMACSAEqualMACDA 

Dos Attack Event when Source MAC is same as Destination MAC.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventIpFragOffset 

Dos Attack Event when Protocol field Offset in IPv4 or IPv6 header is equal to 1.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventV6Type0RoutingHdr 

Dos Attack Event when Type0 Routing Extension header is present in IPv6.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventV6NonLastFragLT1280 

Dos Attack Event when non-last fragment of IPv6 Packet is less than 1280 bytes.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpIpFirstFragSmall 

Dos Attack Event when First Fragment of IP payload with TCP is smaller than configured value.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpOffset 

Dos Attack Event when L4 is TCP and IP protocol offset is equal to 1.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventSynFrag 

Dos Attack Event when TCP SYN Packet with Source Port 0-1023 for non-first fragments tcp/udp port values are always zero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventFlagZeroSeqZero 

Dos Attack Event when TCP Packets with control flags == 0 and sequence number == 0.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsFUP 

Dos Attack Event when TCP Packets with FIN,URG & PSH bits set & sequence number == 0.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsSF 

Dos Attack Event when TCP packets with SYN and FIN set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpPortsEqual 

Dos Attack Event when TCP Source and Destination ports are same.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventUdpPortsEqual 

Dos Attack Event when UDP Source and Destination ports are same.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventIcmp 

Dos Attack Event when ICMP V4 and V6 ping packet with payload bigger than configured value.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventIcmpFragments 

Dos Attack Event when IPv4/IPv6 fragmented ICMP packets.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsSR 

Dos Attack Event when TCP packets with SYN and RST set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsSynFirstFrag 

Dos Attack Event when TCP with SYN set and first fragment of fragmented IP packet.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsFinNoAck 

Dos Attack Event when TCP packet with FIN set but ACK not set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsRstNoAck 

Dos Attack Event when TCP packet with RST set but ACK not set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsNoSFRA 

Dos Attack Event when TCP packet with SYN, FIN, RST and ACK not set.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpDstPortZero 

Dos Attack Event when TCP packet with Destination port equals to 0.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpSrcPortZero 

Dos Attack Event when TCP packet with Source port equals to 0.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpIpDstBcast 

Dos Attack Event when TCP Packet with Destination IP Broadcast.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsZero 

Dos Attack Event when configured TCP flags is zero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsResvdNonZero 

Dos Attack Event when configured Reserved flags is non-zero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsAck 

Dos Attack Event when TCP flag ACK is set and Acknowledge number is zero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsUrgNoUrgPtr 

Dos Attack Event when TCP Flag URG set and Urgent pointer is zero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsNoUrgWithUrgPtr 

Dos Attack Event when TCP Flag URG not set and Urgent pointer is not zero.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventTcpFlagsSynOption 

Dos Attack Event when TCP Flag SYN set and Option same as configured value.

bcmSwitchDosAttackEventCount 

Must be last. Not a usable value.

◆ bcm_switch_event_control_action_e

enum bcm_switch_event_control_action_e

Switch event action controls.

Enumerator
bcmSwitchEventMask

bcmSwitchEventClear 

Clear the event

bcmSwitchEventRead 

read the event

bcmSwitchEventForce 

Activate/diactivate forcing the event

bcmSwitchEventStormTimedCount 

If more then bcmSwitchEventStormTimedCount interrupts occur in bcmSwitchEventStormTimedPeriod period, an interrupt storm is indicated (default hanling same as for bcmSwitchEventStormNominal threshold)

bcmSwitchEventStormTimedPeriod 

If more then bcmSwitchEventStormTimedCount interrupts occur in bcmSwitchEventStormTimedPeriod period, an interrupt storm is indicated (default hanling same as for bcmSwitchEventStormNominal threshold)

bcmSwitchEventStormNominal 

Nominal threshold for interrupt storm detection. If an interrupt occurs more times then the threshold, an interrupt storm is indicated. The default handling for such an interrupt is holding it in masked condition

bcmSwitchEventPriority 

Change handling priority in case of multiple interrupts

bcmSwitchEventLog 

Activate/Diactivate log prints on event

bcmSwitchEventStat 

Enable to Clear/Read event statistics

bcmSwitchEventCorrActOverride 

Enable to override application callback

bcmSwitchEventUnmaskAndClearDisable 

Skip clearing and enabling the asserted interrupt at the end of event corrective action

bcmSwitchEventForceUnmask 

Skip enable interrupt action for asserted interrupt at the end of event corrective action, if the interrupt is not cleared
