bcmSwitchIntHopLimitCpuEnable On INT hop limit exception, copy packet to CPU. 0 to 1
bcmSwitchIntTurnAroundCpuEnable On INT turn around, copy packet to CPU. 0 to 1
bcmSwitchIntMaxPayloadLength INT max payload length. Only apply to Trident3 device. 32 to 0xFFFF
bcmSwitchForwardLookupNotFoundTrap Set forward lookup not found Trap ID. >>>>>>> sdk_master__E2017_11_26_05_30_00 0 to maximum trap ID number
bcmSwitchEtherTypeCustom1 Set Custom_1 Ethernet type. 0 to 0xFFFF
bcmSwitchEtherTypeCustom2 Set Custom_2 Ethernet type. 0 to 0xFFFF
bcmSwitchL3LpmHitbitEnable Enable hit bit lookup update in the LPM table. 0 to 0xFFFF
bcmSwitchL3LpmHitbitDisable Disable hit bit lookup update in the LPM table. 0 to 0xFFFF
bcmSwitchL2FreezeMode Set the approach to freeze L2 ARL table. - BCM_SWITCH_L2_FREEZE_MODE_PORT
  • BCM_SWITCH_L2_FREEZE_MODE_GLOBAL
bcmSwitchEtherDscpRemark Enable copying IP header.TOS to In-DSCP-EXP 0 to 1
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFirstOption Configure TCP option number for switch control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSynOption. Only first option in the TCP option can be checked and compared to with this value. 0 to 0xFF
bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFirstOption Configure Inner TCP option number for switch control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSynOption. Only first option in the TCP option can be checked and compared to with this value. 0 to 0xFF
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsMask Configure TCP control flags valid bits for Dos Attack. This value is used for generating Dos Attack for bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsZero and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsResvdNonZero. 0 to 0xFFF
bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFlagsMask Configure Inner TCP control flags valid bits for Dos Attack. This value is used for generating Dos Attack for bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsZero and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsResvdNonZero. 0 to 0xFFF
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSR Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with SYN and RST Flags set. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsZero Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet in which TCP Control Flag is Zero. Switch Control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsMask and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFlagsMask must be configured to determine valid TCP Flag bits. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSynOption Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with SYN Flag set and option number in payload. Switch Control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFirstOption and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFirstOption must be set required option number for matching. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSynFirstFrag Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with SYN Flags set in first fragment. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsFinNoAck Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with flags FIN set and ACK not set. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsRstNoAck Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with flags RST set and ACK not set. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsNoSFRA Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with no SYN, FIN, RST, ACK Flag set. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsUrgNoUrgPtr Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with URG flag set and Null Urgent Pointer. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsNoUrgWithUrgPtr Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with URG flag not set and non-null Urgent Pointer. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpDstPortZero Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with Destination port as zero. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpSrcPortZero Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with Source Port as zero. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsResvdNonZero Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with Reserved flags non-zero. Switch Control bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsMask and/or bcmSwitchDosAttackInnerTcpFlagsMask must be configured to determine reserved flag bits. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpV4DstBcast Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with Ipv4 Broadcast DIP address. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsAck Enable DOS attack checking for TCP packet with ACK flag set and Acknowledgement number is zero. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMirrorPsampFormat2Epoch Set EPOCH value in PSAMP format2 header. 0-0xFFFF
bcmSwitchVxlanEvpn enable/disable VXLAN EVPN function for broadcast/unknown unicast/multicast packets. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchBfdRxDisable enable/disable BFD RX packet processing. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchGpeEntropyEnable Set UDP Source port for GPE Tunnel Entropy TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchGpeUdpDestPortSet Set UDP Destination port for GPE Unused 16-bit UDP Port
bcmSwitchGeneveEntropyEnable Set UDP Source port for Geneve Tunnel Entropy TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchGeneveUdpDestPortSet Set UDP Destination port for Geneve Unused 16-bit UDP Port
bcmSwitchDlbMonitorIngressRandomSeed Set seed value for random number generator of DLB flow monitor 0x1-0x1FFFFFFE
bcmSwitchVxlanUdpSrcPortSelect BCM56870: Select UDP source port for VxLAN tunnel - bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortStatic - Use static value configured in tunnel initiator
  • bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortHashEntropy - Calculate hash entropy to range [0, 65535] as src port
  • bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortHashEntropyPrivate - Calculate hash entropy to private range [49152, 65535] as src port
bcmSwitchGeneveUdpSrcPortSelect BCM56870: Select UDP source port for GENEVE tunnel - bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortStatic - Use static value configured in tunnel initiator
  • bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortHashEntropy - Calculate hash entropy to range [0, 65535] as src port
  • bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortHashEntropyPrivate - Calculate hash entropy to private range [49152, 65535] as src port
bcmSwitchGpeUdpSrcPortSelect BCM56870: Select UDP source port for GPE tunnel - bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortStatic - Use static value configured in tunnel initiator
  • bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortHashEntropy - Calculate hash entropy to range [0, 65535] as src port
  • bcmSwitchTunnelUdpSrcPortHashEntropyPrivate - Calculate hash entropy to private range [49152, 65535] as src port
bcmSwitchArpMyIp1 Set My-ARP trap configuration of IP 1. 0 to 0xFF
bcmSwitchArpMyIp2 Set My-ARP trap configuration of IP 2. 0 to 0xFF
bcmSwitchArpIgnoreDa Enable ARP trap configuration of Ignore DA. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchNdpMyIp1 Set My-NDP trap configuration of IP 1. 0 to 0xFF
bcmSwitchNdpMyIp2 Set My-NDP trap configuration of IP 2. 0 to 0xFF
bcmSwitchIcmpIgnoreDa Enable ICMP trap configuration of Ignore DA. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchFtmhEtherType Set FTMH header EtherType to match. 0 to 0xFFFF
bcmSwitchReservedEgressNextHop Set reserved egress next hop, which is used to generate L2 header for IPMC packet that does not have L2 header after tunnel termination. Egress next hop
bcmSwitchConcatAppHeader Concat forwarding header or following the forwarding header to master key in ELK. To be used with bcm_switch_control_indexed_set. Value is used of type bcm_switch_concat_header_t
bcmSwitchVxlanGpeUdpDestPortSet Set UDP Destination port for VXLAN-GPE.
bcmSwitchPreserveOtagBeforeItag Controls whether preserved OTAG is before ITAG or after ITAG. - 0 - preserved outer tag is after inner tag
  • 1 - preserved outer tag is before inner tag
bcmPortControlSystemPortOverride When set, port group id used for egress VLAN translation is replaced with destination global logical port (mod, port).
bcmSwitchPcieHotSwapDisable Disable PCIE Hot swap manager. Applicable for CMICX based devices only. TRUE
bcmSwitchL3UcLargeNATEnable Global enable for large scale L3 unicast NAT updates. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchL3UcLargeDNAT Enable large scale DNAT update for the specified L3UC packet. - BCM_L3UC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_TCP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for TCP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_UDP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for UDP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT - Enable Unicast NAT updates for any IPV4 packet.
bcmSwitchL3UcLargeSNAT Enable large scale SNAT update for specified L3UC packet. - BCM_L3UC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_TCP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for TCP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_UDP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for UDP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT - Enable Unicast NAT updates for any IPV4 packet.
bcmSwitchL3UcLargeDNATSNAT Enable large scale DNAT and SNAT updates for specified L3UC packet. - BCM_L3UC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_TCP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for TCP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_UDP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for UDP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT - Enable Unicast NAT updates for any IPV4 packet.
bcmSwitchL3UcLargeDNAPT Enable large scale DNAPT update for specified L3UC packet. - BCM_L3UC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_TCP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for TCP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_UDP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for UDP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT - Enable Unicast NAT updates for any IPV4 packet.
bcmSwitchL3UcLargeSNAPT Enable large scale SNAPT update for specified L3UC packet. - BCM_L3UC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_TCP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for TCP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_UDP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for UDP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT - Enable Unicast NAT updates for any IPV4 packet.
bcmSwitchL3UcLargeDNAPTSNAPT Enable large scale DNAPT and SNAPT updates for specified L3UC packet type. - BCM_L3UC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_TCP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for TCP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT_UDP - Enable Unicast NAT updates for UDP packets only.
  • BCM_L3UC_NAT - Enable Unicast NAT updates for any IPV4 packet.
bcmSwitchL3McLargeNATEnable Global enable for large scale L3 multicast NAT updates. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchL3McLargeNATRewriteType0 Specifies first of 3 rewrite types for large scale multicast NAT updates. - BCM_L3MC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT - Enable Multicast DNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable Multicast DNAT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_SNAT - Enable Multicast SNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_SNAT - Enable both Multicast DNAT and SNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_SNAT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable both Multicast DNAT and SNAT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT - Enable Multicast DNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable Multicast DNAPT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_SNAPT - Enable Multicast SNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_SNAPT - Enable both Multicast DNAPT and SNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_SNAPT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable both Multicast DNAPT and SNAPT updates and MACDA update.
bcmSwitchL3McLargeNATRewriteType1 Specifies second of 3 rewrite types for large scale multicast NAT updates. - BCM_L3MC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT - Enable Multicast DNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable Multicast DNAT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_SNAT - Enable Multicast SNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_SNAT - Enable both Multicast DNAT and SNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_SNAT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable both Multicast DNAT and SNAT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT - Enable Multicast DNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable Multicast DNAPT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_SNAPT - Enable Multicast SNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_SNAPT - Enable both Multicast DNAPT and SNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_SNAPT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable both Multicast DNAPT and SNAPT updates and MACDA update.
bcmSwitchL3McLargeNATRewriteType2 Specifies final rewrite types for large scale multicast NAT updates. - BCM_L3MC_NAT_NONE - Disable the specified NAT update.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT - Enable Multicast DNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable Multicast DNAT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_SNAT - Enable Multicast SNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_SNAT - Enable both Multicast DNAT and SNAT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAT_SNAT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable both Multicast DNAT and SNAT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT - Enable Multicast DNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable Multicast DNAPT updates and MACDA update.
  • BCM_L3MC_SNAPT - Enable Multicast SNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_SNAPT - Enable both Multicast DNAPT and SNAPT updates.
  • BCM_L3MC_DNAPT_SNAPT_WITH_MACDA_UPDATE - Enable both Multicast DNAPT and SNAPT updates and MACDA update.
bcmSwitchL2ChangeFieldsEnable Enable L2 Change Fields for VFI switched packets. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchTrunkDynamicMonitorIngressRandomSeed Set seed value for random number generator of trunk DLB flow monitor 0x1-0x1FFFFFFE
bcmSwitchL2TunnelTpid TPID to be used for outer L2 header VLAN tag insertion during L2 tunnel encapsulation. TPID
bcmSwitchEcnNonTcpResponsive Set default responsive indication value for NON-TCP packets, including NON-IP packets. 1 - Responsive, 0 - Non-responsive.
bcmSwitchHigig3Ethertype Set high 10 bits of HiGig3 EtherType. High 10 bits of EtherType.
bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelTrunkFailover Enable/Disable flow based hashing for Trunk failover. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelHigigTrunk Enable/Disable flow based hashing for HiGig Trunk. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelTrunkDynamic Enable/Disable flow based hashing for Trunk dynamic load balance. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashUseHigig3EntropyTrunkNonUnicast Enable/Disable HiGig3 Entropy based hashing for non-unicast Trunk. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchTrunkUnicastHashOffset Hash offset for Trunk unicast. Hash chunks are arranged as 16-bit hash A0, 16-bit hash A1, 16-bit hash B0, 16-bit hash B1, 16-bit hash C0, 16-bit hash C1, 16-bit Ingress LBN, 16-bit LBID, 64-bit concatenated hash B1_B0_A1_A0, 64-bit concatenated hash C1_C0_A1_A0, 32-bit concatenated hash C1_C0, 64-bit concatenated hash C1_C0_B1_B0, 16-bit Ingress LBN, 16-bit LBID. For a given arg, both of the msb and chunk are determined. 0-127 , >=128 concat mode
bcmSwitchTrunkNonUnicastHashOffset Hash offset for Trunk non-unicast. Hash chunks are arranged as 16-bit hash A0, 16-bit hash A1, 16-bit hash B0, 16-bit hash B1, 16-bit hash C0, 16-bit hash C1, 16-bit Ingress LBN, 16-bit LBID, 64-bit concatenated hash B1_B0_A1_A0, 64-bit concatenated hash C1_C0_A1_A0, 32-bit concatenated hash C1_C0, 64-bit concatenated hash C1_C0_B1_B0, 16-bit Ingress LBN, 16-bit LBID. For a given arg, both of the msb and chunk are determined. 0-127 , >=128 concat mode
bcmSwitchHigigTrunkHashOffset Hash offset for HiGig Trunk. Hash chunks are arranged as 16-bit hash A0, 16-bit hash A1, 16-bit hash B0, 16-bit hash B1, 16-bit hash C0, 16-bit hash C1, 16-bit Ingress LBN, 16-bit LBID, 64-bit concatenated hash B1_B0_A1_A0, 64-bit concatenated hash C1_C0_A1_A0, 32-bit concatenated hash C1_C0, 64-bit concatenated hash C1_C0_B1_B0, 16-bit Ingress LBN, 16-bit LBID. For a given arg, both of the msb and chunk are determined. 0-127 , >=128 concat mode
bcmSwitchVpTrunkHashOffset Hash offset for virtual port Trunk. Hash chunks are arranged as 16-bit hash A0, 16-bit hash A1, 16-bit hash B0, 16-bit hash B1, 16-bit hash C0, 16-bit hash C1, 16-bit Ingress LBN, 16-bit LBID, 64-bit concatenated hash B1_B0_A1_A0, 64-bit concatenated hash C1_C0_A1_A0, 32-bit concatenated hash C1_C0, 64-bit concatenated hash C1_C0_B1_B0, 16-bit Ingress LBN, 16-bit LBID. For a given arg, both of the msb and chunk are determined. 0-127 , >=128 concat mode
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkUnicastHashConcatEnable Enable hash concatenation for HiGig Trunk unicast macro flow. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkNonUnicastHashConcatEnable Enable hash concatenation for HiGig Trunk non-unicast macro flow. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkFailoverHashConcatEnable Enable hash concatenation for Trunk failover macro flow. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkFailoverHashConcatEnable Enable hash concatenation for HiGig Trunk failover macro flow. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkDynamicHashConcatEnable Enable hash concatenation for trunk dynamic load balance macro flow. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMacroFlowVpTrunkHashConcatEnable Enable hash concatenation for virtual port trunk group. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkUnicastHashSeed Set Hash Seed for Trunk unicast macro flow. It doesn't support get, because the seed is scrambled. Random seed value 0x1-0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkNonUnicastHashSeed Set Hash Seed for Trunk non-unicast macro flow. It doesn't support get, because the seed is scrambled. Random seed value 0x1-0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkFailoverHashSeed Set Hash Seed for Trunk failover macro flow. It doesn't support get, because the seed is scrambled. Random seed value 0x1-0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkFailoverHashSeed Set Hash Seed for HiGig Trunk failover macro flow. It doesn't support get, because the seed is scrambled. Random seed value 0x1-0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkDynamicHashSeed Set Hash Seed for Trunk dynamic load balance macro flow. It doesn't support get, because the seed is scrambled. Random seed value 0x1-0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchMacroFlowVpTrunkHashSeed Set Hash Seed for virtual port Trunk macro flow. It doesn't support get, because the seed is scrambled. Random seed value 0x1-0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkUnicastHashMinOffset BCM56880 Minimum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk unicast. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkUnicastHashMaxOffset BCM56880 Maximum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk unicast. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkUnicastHashStrideOffset BCM56880 Offset increment value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk unicast. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkNonUnicastHashMinOffset BCM56880 Minimum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk non-unicast. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkNonUnicastHashMaxOffset BCM56880 Maximum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk non-unicast. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkNonUnicastHashStrideOffset BCM56880 Offset increment value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk non-unicast. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkFailoverHashMinOffset BCM56880 Minimum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk failover. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkFailoverHashMaxOffset BCM56880 Maximum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk failover. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkFailoverHashStrideOffset BCM56880 Offset increment value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk failover. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkFailoverHashMinOffset BCM56880 Minimum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for higig trunk failover. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkFailoverHashMaxOffset BCM56880 Maximum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for higig trunk failover. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowHigigTrunkFailoverHashStrideOffset BCM56880 Offset increment value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for higig trunk failover. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkDynamicHashMinOffset BCM56880 Minimum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk dynamic load balance. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkDynamicHashMaxOffset BCM56880 Maximum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk dynamic load balance. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowTrunkDynamicHashStrideOffset BCM56880 Offset increment value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for trunk dynamic load balance. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowVpTrunkHashMinOffset BCM56880 Minimum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for virtual port trunk. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowVpTrunkHashMaxOffset BCM56880 Maximum offset value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for virtual port trunk. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowVpTrunkHashStrideOffset BCM56880 Offset increment value to be used in macroflow hash output selection for virtual port trunk. 0-127 (BCM56880),0-255 concat mode (BCM56880)
bcmSwitchTrunkRandomSeed Seed for RNG used in Trunk hashing. 0 to 0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchHigigTrunkRandomSeed Seed for RNG used in HiGig Trunk hashing. 0 to 0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchVPTrunkRandomSeed Seed for RNG used in virtual port Trunk hashing. 0 to 0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthVlanTranslate3 Maximum levels checked for moving entries in multi bank hash mode for vlan translate 3 tables. >=0
bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthL2Tunnel Maximum levels checked for moving entries in multi bank hash mode for L2 tunnel termination tables. >=0
bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthL2TunnelVnid Maximum levels checked for moving entries in multi bank hash mode for L2 tunnel VNID tables. >=0
bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthFlowTracker Maximum levels checked for moving entries in multi bank hash mode for flow tracker tables. >=0
bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthIpmcGroup Maximum levels checked for moving entries in multi bank hash mode for L3 IPv4/IPv6 multicast (*,G) tables. >=0
bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthIpmcSourceGroup Maximum levels checked for moving entries in multi bank hash mode for L3 IPv4/IPv6 multicast (S,G) tables. >=0
bcmSwitchHashMultiMoveDepthL2mc Maximum levels checked for moving entries in multi bank hash mode for L2 IPv4/IPv6 multicast tables. >=0
bcmSwitchDosAttackMaxIpPayloadEnable Enable outer IP payload maximum size check. 1 is enable and 0 (default) is disable. 0-1
bcmSwitchDosAttackMaxIpPayloadSize Maximum outer IP payload size value for outer IP payload maximum size check. 0-0xffff
bcmSwitchDosAttackMinIpPayloadEnable Enable outer IP payload minimum size check. 1 is enable and 0 (default) is disable. 0-1
bcmSwitchDosAttackMinIpPayloadSize Minimum outer IP payload size value for outer IP payload minimum size check. 0-0xffff
bcmSwitchDosAttackMaxInnerIpPayloadEnable Enable inner IP payload maximum size check. 1 is enable and 0 (default) is disable. 0-1
bcmSwitchDosAttackMaxInnerIpPayloadSize Maximum inner IP payload size value for inner IP payload maximum size check. 0-0xffff
bcmSwitchDosAttackMinInnerIpPayloadEnable Enable inner IP payload minimum size check. 1 is enable and 0 (default) is disable. 0-1
bcmSwitchDosAttackMinInnerIpPayloadSize Minimum inner IP payload size value for inner IP payload minimum size check. 0-0xffff
bcmSwitchEccSingleBitBusBufferErrorEvent Enable/Disable 1bit ECC error reporting for internal bus and buffer. - 0 - disable 1bit report for internal bus/buffer
  • 1 - enable 1bit report for internal bus/buffer
typedef enum bcm_switch_ecmp_hash_bit_count_e {
BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_10 = 0, // Select lower 10 bits of ECMP hash value to do mudulo operation `
BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_11,
BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_12,
BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_13,
BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_14,
BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_15,
BCM_SWITCH_ECMP_HASH_BIT_COUNT_LOWER_16,
} bcm_switch_ecmp_hash_bit_count_t;
typedef enum bcm_switch_pfc_deadlock_action_e {
bcmSwitchPFCDeadlockActionTransmit = 0, // Transmit packets in Recovery state (ignoring the PFC state)-Default Action
bcmSwitchPFCDeadlockActionDrop = 1, // Drop packets in Recovery state.
bcmSwitchPFCDeadlockActionMaxCount = 2 // Maximum PFC Deadlock Recovery action type count
} bcm_switch_pfc_deadlock_action_t;
typedef enum bcm_switch_pfc_deadlock_detection_interval_e {
bcmSwitchPFCDeadlockDetectionInterval100MiliSecond = 0, // 100 ms interval for Detection interval (default)
bcmSwitchPFCDeadlockDetectionInterval10MiliSecond = 1, // 10ms interval for Detection interval
bcmSwitchPFCDeadlockDetectionIntervalCount = 2 // Maximum PFC deadlock detecion type count
} bcm_switch_pfc_deadlock_detection_interval_t;
typedef enum bcm_switch_oam_stacking_support_e {
bcmSwitchOamStackingSupportNone = 0, // Do not carry OAM endpoint context in place of VC label in stacking header
bcmSwitchOamStackingSupportOamContextInStackingHeader = 1 // Carry OAM endpoint context in place of VC label in stacking header
} bcm_switch_oam_stacking_support_t;
typedef struct bcm_switch_control_key_s {
bcm_switch_control_t type;
int index;
} bcm_switch_control_key_t;
typedef struct bcm_switch_control_info_s {
int arg;
} bcm_switch_control_info_t;
Parameters
[in,out]unitBCM device number
[in,out]portDevice or logical port number
[in,out]typeSwitch control parameter (see bcm_switches)
[in,out]arg(for "_set") Argument whose meaning is dependent on type
(for "_get", OUT) Value whose meaning is dependent on type
Return values
BCM_E_UNAVAILFeature not available on this device
BCM_E_XXXOther error

◆ bcm_switch_control_set()

int bcm_switch_control_set ( int  unit,
bcm_switch_control_t  type,
int  arg 
)

Configure port-specific and device-wide operating modes. Device wide operating modes are configured on all ports, except the stack ports.

These APIs set parameters related to general device operation such as controlling whether certain types of packets should be sent to the local CPU, or setting the priority to be used when such packets are forwarded to the CPU. The port specific operations affect only the indicated port (where possible) while the general APIs affect all ports. Not all operations can be carried out on individual ports on all devices.

Switch Type Values
Value Description Arg Value
bcmSwitchIgmpReportLeaveToCpu Copy IGMP report or leave messages to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpReportLeaveDrop Drop IGMP report or leave messages TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpReportLeaveFlood Flood IGMP report or leave messages to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV4ResvdMcPktToCpu Copy Packets with Reserved IPv4 Multicast addresses to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV4ResvdMcPktDrop Drop Packets with Reserved IPv4 Multicast addresses TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV4ResvdMcPktFlood Flood Packets with Reserved IPv4 Multicast addresses to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV6ResvdMcPktToCpu Copy Packets with Reserved IPv6 Multicast addresses to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV6ResvdMcPktDrop Drop Packets with Reserved IPv6 Multicast addresses TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV6ResvdMcPktFlood Flood Packets with Reserved IPv6 Multicast addresses to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpQueryToCpu Copy IGMP query messages to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpQueryDrop Drop IGMP query messages TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpQueryFlood Flood IGMP query messages to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpUnknownToCpu Copy unknown IGMP messages to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpUnknownDrop Drop unknown IGMP messages TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpUnknownFlood Flood unknown IGMP messages to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldReportDoneToCpu Copy MLD report Done messages to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldReportDoneDrop Drop MLD report Done messages TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldReportDoneFlood Flood MLD report Done messages to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldQueryToCpu Copy MLD Query messages to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldQueryDrop Drop MLD Query messages TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldQueryFlood Flood MLD Query messages to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcV4RouterDiscoveryToCpu Copy IPv4 multicast advertisement/Solicitation/Termination packet to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcV4RouterDiscoveryDrop Drop IPv4 multicast advertisement/Solicitation/Termination packet TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcV4RouterDiscoveryFlood Flood IPv4 multicast advertisement/Solicitation/Termination packet to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcV6RouterDiscoveryToCpu Copy IPv6 multicast advertisement/Solicitation/Termination packet to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcV6RouterDiscoveryDrop Drop IPv6 multicast advertisement/Solicitation/Termination packet TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcV6RouterDiscoveryFlood Flood IPv6 multicast advertisement/Solicitation/Termination packet to VLAN TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchModuleType Switch type bcmSwitchModuleType is designed to be write-only and used internally for switching of non-unicast packets on trunks among multiple devices across StrataXGS?III family and pre-StrataXGS?III families. With pre-xgs III devices phasing out this switch control is re-designed to take only XGS3 as permitted value. This value is set by default currently and will be deprecated soon. Supported Module types
  • BCM_SWITCH_MODULE_XGS3 - StrataXGS?III
bcmSwitchCpuToCpuEnable Enables copying packets from CMIC to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMcastFloodBlocking If this bit is set, the current PFM rule in place is applied. If not set it disables PFM rule check - when IGMP/MLD/ReservedMC/MC Router Adv packets are flooded to VLAN. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpUcastEnable If set treats Unicast packets with IGMP payload as IGMP packets. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldUcastEnable If set treats Unicast packets with MLD payload as MLD packets. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldDirectAttachedOnly If set, accept MLD packets only from direct attached neighbors. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpReservedMcastEnable If set, IGMP packet which has a IPv4 reserved multicast address is treated as a IGMP packet. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldReservedMcastEnable If set, MLD packet which has a IPv6 reserved multicast address is treated as a MLD packet. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHgHdrErrToCpu HiGig error packets are sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchClassTagPacketsToCpu HiGig2 packets with a PPD header of 1 are sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcTunnelToCpu IPMC tunneling packets are sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchStationMoveOverLearnLimitToCpu Station movement that causes exceeding L2 learn limit packets are sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchClassBasedMoveFailPktToCpu Class-based learning check failed packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchClassBasedMoveFailPktDrop Class-based learning check failed packets should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMcastUnknownErrToCpu Packets with Multicast unknown index are sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchLearnLimitPriority Priority for packets exceeded L2 learn limit sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchControlOpcodePriority Priority for packets with CPU Opcode sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuProtoBpduPriority Priority used for protocol BPDU packets sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuProtoArpPriority Priority used for ARP/ND packets sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuProtoIgmpPriority Priority used for IGMP/MLD packets sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuProtoDhcpPriority Priority used for DHCP packets sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuProtoIpmcReservedPriority Priority used for IPv4/IPv6 multicast packets sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuProtoIpOptionsPriority Priority used for IPv4/IPv6 packets with options or IPv6 packets with payload length zero (jumbo option) sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuProtoExceptionsPriority Priority used for IPv4/IPv6 packets with TTL 1 sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuProtocolPrio Priority used for BPDU packets sent to CPU. Some devices allow finer grained control of CPU Protocol packets using the bcmSwitchCpuProto*Priority switch controls. For example, BPDU packet behavior is configured with bcmSwitchCpuProtoBpduPriority instead of bcmSwitchCpuProtocolPrio on these devices. 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuUnknownPrio Priority used for unknown SA or DA packets sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuSamplePrio Priority used for sampled packets sent to CPU (for sFlow) 0-7
bcmSwitchCpuDefaultPrio Priority used for all other packets sent to CPU 0-7
bcmSwitchL2StaticMoveToCpu Port movement of static L2 addr are sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchUnknownIpmcToCpu Send unknown IP multicasts to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchUnknownMcastToCpu Send unknown multicasts to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchUnknownUcastToCpu Send DLF packets (destination lookup failure) to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchNonIpL3ErrToCpu Send Non-IP packets with L3 error to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchL3HeaderErrToCpu L3 packets with invalid header fields (invalid checksum, TTL 0, etc) should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchUnknownVlanToCpu Packets whose VLAN is not in the VLAN table should be sent to the CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchUnknownL3SrcToCpu L3 packets with unknown source IP should be sent to the CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchUnknownL3DestToCpu L3 packets with unknown destination IP should be sent to the CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV4L3DstMissToCpu L3 packets with unknown destination IPV4 address should be sent to the CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV6L3DstMissToCpu L3 packets with unknown destination IPV6 address should be sent to the CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcPortMissToCpu IPMC Packets from a non programmed source port should be sent to the CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcErrorToCpu IPMC packets with header errors or with TTL 0 should be sent to the CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchVCLabelMissToCpu Send VC mismatch packet to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchSourceRouteToCpu Send multicast SA packet to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchSampleIngressRandomSeed Set the seed for the random number generator that determines if a packet should be sampled on ingress (for sFlow) 0x1-0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchSampleEgressRandomSeed Set the seed for the random number generator that determines if a packet should be sampled on egress (for sFlow) 0x1-0xFFFFFF
bcmSwitchCpuFpCopyPrio Set the priority for the packets sent to CPU by FP 0x0-0x07
bcmSwitchCpuIcmpRedirectPrio Set the priority for the ICMP packets redirected to CPU 0x0-0x07
bcmSwitchCpuMtuFailPrio Set the priority for the packets sent to CPU due to MTU failure 0x0-0x07
bcmSwitchCpuMirrorPrio Set the priority for the packets mirrored to CPU 0x0-0x07
bcmSwitchCpuLookupFpCopyPrio Set the priority for Lookup FP copy to CPU 0x0-0x07
bcmSwitchL2NonStaticMoveToCpu L2 packets with non-static address should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV6L3ErrToCpu Invalid IPv6 packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV6L3DstMissToCpu IPv6 L3 packets with unknown destination should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV4L3ErrToCpu Invalid L3 packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV6L3LocalLinkDrop IPv6 packets with link local sources should be dropped. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchV4L3DstMissToCpu L3 packets with unknown destination soled be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchTunnelErrToCpu Invalid tunnel packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMartianAddrToCpu Martian packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchL3UcTtlErrToCpu L3 unicast packets with invalid TTL should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchL3SlowpathToCpu L3 slowpath packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIpmcTtlErrToCpu IPMC packets with invalid TTL should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackToCpu DoS attack packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackSipEqualDip Enable DoS attack checking for IP SIP equal DIP TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackIcmpFragments Fragmented ICMP packets for DoS attacks TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpOffset Packets with TCP header offset equals to 1 check for DoS attacks TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackUdpPortsEqual UDP packets where destination port is same as source port check for DoS attacks TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpPortsEqual TCP packets where destination port is same as source port check for DoS attacks TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsSF TCP packets with SYN and FIN bits enable check for DoS attacks TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlagsFUP TCP packets with FIN, URG, PSH bits enable and sequence number = 0 check for DoS attacks TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackMinTcpHdrSize Minimum TCP header size value for header size DoS attacks 0x0-0xFF
bcmSwitchDosAttackV4FirstFrag Enable DoS attack checking for IPv4 first fragments TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFlags Enable DoS attack checking for TCP flags TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackL4Port Enable DoS attack checking for L4 port numbers TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpFrag Enable DoS attack checking for TCP fragments TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackIcmp Enable DoS attack checking for ICMP packet size for V4 and V6 TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackIcmpV4 Enable DoS attack checking for ICMPv4 packet size TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackIcmpV6 Enable DoS attack checking for ICMPv6 packet size TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackIcmpPktOversize Maximum ICMP packet size value for ICMP size checking 0x0-0x3FFF
bcmSwitchDosAttackIcmpV6PingSize Maximum IPv6 ping packet size value 0x0-0x3FFF
bcmSwitchDosAttackTcpXMas SeqNum, Fin, Urg, Psh equal 0 TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDosAttackL3Header IPv4/6 header length checks. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIcmpRedirectToCpu ICMP packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMplsExtendedLabelTtl MPLS Extended label - TTL value 0x00-0xFF
bcmSwitchMplsSequenceErrToCpu MPLS Sequence number check failures should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMplsLabelMissToCpu MPLS label lookup failures should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMplsTtlErrToCpu MPLS packets with TTL value 0 or 1 should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMplsInvalidL3PayloadToCpu Invalid MPLS payload packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMplsInvalidActionToCpu MPLS packets with invalid actions should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchSharedVlanMismatchToCpu Private VLAN VID mismatch should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchL3SrcUrpfErrToCpu L3 packets with invalid uRPF source address should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchGreKeyToVlan Enable system configuration for GRE enhancement (including GRE.key) TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchArpReplyToCpu APR reply packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchArpReplyDrop APR reply packets should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchArpRequestToCpu APR request packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchArpRequestDrop APR request packets should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchArpReplyMyStationL2ToCPU APR Only APR reply packets with My MAC should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchArpRequestMyStationIPToCPU APR reply packets with My IP address should be sent to CPU IPv4 address
bcmSwitchArpRequestMyStationIPDrop APR reply packets with My IP address should be dropped IPv4 address
bcmSwitchArpRequestMyStationIPFwd APR reply packets with given IP address should not trapped/dropped IPv4 address
bcmSwitchL3SIPMoveToCpu If enabled IP packets received in port different than port configured in routing table for this IP will be snooped to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchTrunkHashSrcPortEnable BCM886XX: Make Source port part of the hash TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchTrunkHashOffset BCM886XX: Hash key is barrel shifted by this value 0-7
bcmSwitchTrunkHashMPLSLabelBOS In an mpls label stack, look for label with bottom of stack bit set. Valid values see BCM_HASH_MPLS_LABEL_BOS_ - BCM_HASH_MPLS_LABEL_NONE
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_LABEL_BOS_START
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_LABEL_BOS_SKIP
bcmSwitchTrunkHashMPLSPWControlWord BCM886XX: Indicates control word is present at end of MPLS headers TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchTrunkHashSeed BCM886XX: Initial seed value for trunk hashing 0x0000?xffff
bcmSwitchTrunkHashConfig BCM886XX: Selects hashing polynomial - BCM_HASH_CONFIG_NONE
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC8_0x14D
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC8_0x1C3
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC8_0x1CF
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x17111
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x10491
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x155F5
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x1013D
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x13965
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x1698D
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x1105D
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x10861
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x10285
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x101a1
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x12499
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x1f801
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x172e1
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x1eb21
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_FP_DATA
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_ROUND_ROBIN
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CLOCK_BASED
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x8003
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x8011
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x8423
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x8101
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x84a1
  • BCM_HASH_CONFIG_CRC16_0x9019
bcmSwitchTrunkHashPktHeaderCount BCM886XX: Number of headers to consider in hashing TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchTrunkHashPktHeaderSelect BCM886XX: Selects which starting header to use for hashing - BCM_HASH_HEADER_FORWARD - Forward header as starting header for hashing
  • BCM_HASH_HEADER_TERMINATED - Last terminated header as starting header for hashing
bcmSwitchTrunkHashNormalize BCM886XX: Enables using same hash in both directions of a flow. Applies to both MAC and IP addresses TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchECMPHashSrcPortEnable BCM886XX: Make Source port part of the ECMP hash TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchECMPHashOffset To indicate that the LB key is barrel shifted by this value 0-7
bcmSwitchECMPSecondHierHashOffset BCM88680: ECMP second hierarchy Hash key is barrel shifted by this value
bcmSwitchECMPSecondHierHashConfig BCM88680: Selects hashing polynomial for the second hierarchy of the ECMP
bcmSwitchIngressRateLimitMpps Limit ingress rate in Mega Packets Per Second
SwitchMirrorSnoopForwardOriginalWhenDropped BCM88{3,6}{7,8}x: When dropping the mirror and/or snoop packet copies due to FIFOs being full, do not drop the original (forward) copy
bcmSwitchECMPHashSeed BCM886XX: Initial seed value for ECMP hashing 0x0000?xffff
bcmSwitchECMPHashConfig BCM886XX: Selects hashing polynomial for ECMP - BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR8 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR8
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR4 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR4
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR2 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR2
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR1 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR1
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16 - 16-bit CRC16
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_XOR16 - 16-bit XOR (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16CCITT - 16-bit CRC16 using CCITT polynomial (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32LO - Lower 16-bit of CRC32 (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32HI - Higher 16-bit of CRC32 (BCM56840 only)
bcmSwitchECMPHashPktHeaderCount BCM886XX: Number of headers to consider in ECMP hashing TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchNdPktToCpu ND packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchNdPktDrop ND packets should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpPktToCpu IGMP packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpToCPU The same definition with bcmSwitchIgmpPktToCpu, this definition for legacy support only. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIgmpPktDrop IGMP packets should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDhcpPktToCpu DHCP packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDhcpPktDrop DHCP packets should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldPktToCpu MLD packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMldPktDrop MLD packets should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIPv4ResvdMcPktToCpu Multicast packets with the reserved address should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIPv4ResvdMcPktDrop Multicast packets with the reserved address should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIPv6ResvdMcPktToCpu Multicast packets with the reserved IPv6 address should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchIPv6ResvdMcPktDrop Multicast packets with the reserved IPv6 address should be dropped TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDirectedMirroring Enable directed mirroring mode Default value is true. This switch control cannot be set to false by user to maintain consistency in mirroring behavior across all devices. TRUE
bcmSwitchDirectedUnmarked Send directed mirror packets across HiGig links as a simple unicast TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchPktAge Global MMU packet age timer setting in milliseconds 0-7162
bcmSwitchMcastFloodDefault Default multicast flood mode setting for VLAN create. VLAN multicast flood mode, see table BCM_VLAN_MCAST_FLOOD_table
bcmSwitchParityErrorToCpu Table lookup parity error packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchL3MtuFailToCpu L3 MTU fail packets should be sent to CPU TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchMeterAdjust Per Packet adjustment for metering and rate control (generally used to account for IPG) Number of bytes to add to packet length
bcmSwitchMeterAdjustInterframeGap Indicate the size in Bytes of the IFG in Header-compensation for policer.
bcmSwitchHashL2 Hash select for L2 - BCM_HASH_ZERO - Always return 0 (debug only)
  • BCM_HASH_LSB - return LSB of key
  • BCM_HASH_CRC16L - Lower bits of CRC-16
  • BCM_HASH_CRC16U - Upper bits of CRC-16
  • BCM_HASH_CRC32L - Lower bits of CRC-32
  • BCM_HASH_CRC32U - Upper bits of CRC-32
bcmSwitchHashL3 Hash select for L3 Same as bcmSwitchHashL2
bcmSwitchHashMultipath Hash select for Multipath - BCM_HASH_ZERO - Always return 0 (debug only)
  • BCM_HASH_LSB - return LSB of key
  • BCM_HASH_CRC32L - Lower bits of CRC-32
  • BCM_HASH_CRC32U - Upper bits of CRC-32
bcmSwitchHashControl Hash Control for L2, L3 and Multipath (ECMP/WCMP) - BCM_HASH_CONTROL_MULTIPATH_L4PORTS - Use TCP/UDP ports for Multipath hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_MULTIPATH_DIP - Use destination IP address for Multipath hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_MULTIPATH_USERDEF - User defined ECMP seed. The seed will concatenate with other sources to construct the ECMP key
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_TRUNK_UC_XGS2 - BCM5695-compatible unicast trunk hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_TRUNK_UC_SRCPORT - Use source port for unicast trunk hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_TRUNK_NUC_DST - Use destination MAC or IP address for non-unicast trunk hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_TRUNK_NUC_SRC - Use source MAC or IP address for non-unicast trunk hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_TRUNK_NUC_MODPORT - Use module ID and port for non-unicast trunk hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_ECMP_ENHANCE - Use enhanced (RTAG7) ECMP hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_TRUNK_NUC_ENHANCE - Use enhanced (RTAG7) non-unicast trunk hashing
  • BCM_HASH_CONTROL_ECMP_OVERLAY_ENHANCE - Use enhanced (RTAG7) hashing for ECMP in overlay layer
bcmSwitchFieldMultipathHashSelect Hash select for field redirected multipath frames - BCM_HASH_ZERO - Always return 0 (debug only)
  • BCM_HASH_CRC32L - Lower bits of CRC-32
  • BCM_HASH_CRC32U - Upper bits of CRC-32
  • BCM_HASH_XORL - Lower bits of key bytes xor
  • BCM_HASH_XORU - Upper bits of key bytes xor
bcmSwitchFieldMultipathHashSeed Seed value for field multipath hash selection key. Seed value.
bcmSwitchMirrorStackMode Select BCM56504, BCM5670, or BCM5675-A0-style stacking - BCM_MIRROR_STACK_MODE_XGS3 - stacking with BCM56504
  • BCM_MIRROR_STACK_MODE_XGS1 - stacking with BCM5670
  • BCM_MIRROR_STACK_MODE_XGS2 - stacking with BCM5675-A0
bcmSwitchMirrorSrcModCheck Source module ID check in BCM56504-style of mirroring TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchDestPortHGTrunk Enable to use destination port in selecting egress port for HiGig trunks. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchColorSelect Select source parameter to convert into color selection. - BCM_COLOR_PRIORITY - map VLAN priority to color
  • BCM_COLOR_OUTER_CFI - map CFI to color
  • BCM_COLOR_INNER_CFI - map inner tag CFI to color
bcmSwitchModuleLoopback Enable ingress of packets with local module ID TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchSrcModBlockMirrorCopy Enable BCM5670-compatible source module ID blocking TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchSrcModBlockMirrorOnly Enable BCM5675-A0-compatible source module ID blocking TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashSetTflowMode BCM56960 If on, hash selection of b0/b1 is allowed regardless of th_tflow_enabled state. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashSeed0 BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 hash seed 0 for enhanced hashing algorithm. 0x0-0xFFFFFFFF
bcmSwitchHashSeed1 BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 hash seed 1 for enhanced hashing algorithm. 0x0-0xFFFFFFFF
bcmSwitchHashField0PreProcessEnable Enable pre-processing for BCM56840 enhanced hash mode 0 TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashField1PreProcessEnable Enable pre-processing for BCM56840 enhanced hash mode 1 TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashField0OverlayCntagRpidEnable Enable overlay of CN-tag's RPID onto hash seed 0. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashField1OverlayCntagRpidEnable Enable overlay of CN-tag's RPID onto hash seed 1. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashField0Config BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 enhanced hash mode 0 configuration - BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR8 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR8
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR4 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR4
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR2 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR2
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR1 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR1
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16 - 16-bit CRC16
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_XOR16 - 16-bit XOR (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16CCITT - 16-bit CRC16 using CCITT polynomial (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32LO - Lower 16-bit of CRC32 (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32HI - Higher 16-bit of CRC32 (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_LO - Lower 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_HI - Higher 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_LO - Lower 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_HI - Higher 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
bcmSwitchHashField0Config1 BCM56840 enhanced hash mode 0 second configuration - BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR8 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR8
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR4 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR4
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR2 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR2
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR1 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR1
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16 - 16-bit CRC16
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_XOR16 - 16-bit XOR
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16CCITT - 16-bit CRC16 using CCITT polynomial
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32LO - Lower 16-bit of CRC32
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32HI - Higher 16-bit of CRC32
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_LO - Lower 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_HI - Higher 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_LO - Lower 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_HI - Higher 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
bcmSwitchHashField1Config BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 enhanced hash mode 1 configuration - BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR8 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR8
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR4 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR4
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR2 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR2
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR1 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR1
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16 - 16-bit CRC16
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_XOR16 - 16-bit XOR (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16CCITT - 16-bit CRC16 using CCITT polynomial (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32LO - Lower 16-bit of CRC32 (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32HI - Higher 16-bit of CRC32 (BCM56840 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_LO - Lower 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_HI - Higher 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_LO - Lower 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_HI - Higher 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
bcmSwitchHashField1Config1 BCM56840 enhanced hash mode 1 second configuration - BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR8 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR8
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR4 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR4
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR2 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR2
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR1 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR1
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16 - 16-bit CRC16
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_XOR16 - 16-bit XOR
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16CCITT - 16-bit CRC16 using CCITT polynomial
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32LO - Lower 16-bit of CRC32
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32HI - Higher 16-bit of CRC32
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_LO - Lower 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_HI - Higher 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_LO - Lower 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_HI - Higher 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
bcmSwitchMacroFlowHashFieldConfig Enhanced macro flow mode configuration - BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR8 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR8
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR4 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR4
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR2 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR2
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16XOR1 - Upper 8-bit CRC16 + 8-bit XOR1
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16 - 16-bit CRC16
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_XOR16 - 16-bit XOR
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC16CCITT - 16-bit CRC16 using CCITT polynomial
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32LO - Lower 16-bit of CRC32
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32HI - Higher 16-bit of CRC32
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_LO - Lower 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_ETH_HI - Higher 16-bit of Ethernet CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_LO - Lower 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CONFIG_CRC32_KOOPMAN_HI - Higher 16-bit of Koopman CRC32 (BCM56960 only)
bcmSwitchHashSelectControl BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580 field selection control for enhanced hashing algorithm. - BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_IP4 - selection 0 for IPv4 packets
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_IP4 - selection 1 for IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_IP6 - selection 0 for IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_IP6 - selection 1 for IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_MPLS - selection 0 for MPLS pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_MPLS - selection 1 for MPLS pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_IP - selection 0 for tunnel IPv4 over IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_IP - selection 1 for tunnel IPv4 over IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_IP - selection 0 for tunnel IPv6 over IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_IP - selection 1 for tunnel IPv6 over IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_GRE - selection 0 for tunnel IPv4 over GRE pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_GRE - selection 1 for tunnel IPv4 over GRE pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_GRE - selection 0 for tunnel IPv6 over GRE pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_GRE - selection 1 for tunnel IPv6 over GRE pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_IP6 - selection 0 for tunnel IPv4 over IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_IP6 - selection 1 for tunnel IPv4 over IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_IP6 - selection 0 for tunnel IPv6 over IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_IP6 - selection 1 for tunnel IPv6 over IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_FCOE - selection 0 for FCoE pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_FCOE - selection 1 for FCoE pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_GRE_IP4 - selection 0 for tunnel IPv4 over GRE IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_GRE_IP6 - selection 0 for tunnel IPv4 over GRE IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_GRE_IP4 - selection 1 for tunnel IPv4 over GRE IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP4_GRE_IP6 - selection 1 for tunnel IPv4 over GRE IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_GRE_IP4 - selection 0 for tunnel IPv6 over GRE IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_GRE_IP6 - selection 0 for tunnel IPv6 over GRE IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_GRE_IP4 - selection 1 for tunnel IPv6 over GRE IPv4 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_TUNNEL_IP6_GRE_IP6 - selection 1 for tunnel IPv6 over GRE IPv6 pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD0_DISABLE_VXLAN - selection 0 for tunnel VXLAN pkts
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD1_DISABLE_VXLAN - selection 1 for tunnel VXLAN pkts
bcmSwitchHashIP4Field0 BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for IPv4 packets. - BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_PROTOCOL - Protocol ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTL4 - Destination L4 port
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCL4 - Source L4 port
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_VLAN - VLAN ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4DST_LO - IPv4 destination address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4DST_HI - IPv4 destination address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4SRC_LO - IPv4 source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4SRC_HI - IPv4 source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier (BCM56840 only)
bcmSwitchHashIP4Field1 BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 1 for IPv4 packets. - BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_PROTOCOL - Protocol ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTL4 - Destination L4 port
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCL4 - Source L4 port
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_VLAN - VLAN ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4DST_LO - IPv4 destination address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4DST_HI - IPv4 destination address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4SRC_LO - IPv4 source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4SRC_HI - IPv4 source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier (BCM56840 only)
bcmSwitchHashIP4TcpUdpField0 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for IPv4 TCP/UDP packets. Same as bcmSwitchHashIp4Field0
bcmSwitchHashIP4TcpUdpField1 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 1 for IPv4 TCP/UDP packets. Same as bcmSwitchHashIp4Field0
bcmSwitchHashIP4TcpUdpPortsEqualField0 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for IPv4 TCP/UDP packets whose source L4 port equals to destination L4 port. Same as bcmSwitchHashIp4Field0
bcmSwitchHashIP4TcpUdpPortsEqualField1 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 1 for IPv4 TCP/UDP packets whose source L4 port equals to destination L4 port. Same as bcmSwitchHashIp4Field0
bcmSwitchHashIP6Field0 BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for IPv6 packets. - BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID, reusing BCM_HASH_FIELD_FLOWLABEL_LO selection controlled by bcmSwitchHashField0Ip6FlowLabel
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID, reusing BCM_HASH_FIELD_FLOWLABEL_HI selection controlled by bcmSwitchHashField0Ip6FlowLabel
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_NXT_HDR - Next header
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTL4 - Destination L4 port
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCL4 - Source L4 port
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_VLAN - VLAN ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_FLOWLABEL_LO - IPv6 flow label lower 16 bits, reusing BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD selection controlled by bcmSwitchHashField0Ip6FlowLabel
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_FLOWLABEL_HI - IPv6 flow label upper 4 bits, reusing BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT selection controlled by bcmSwitchHashField0Ip6FlowLabel
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6DST_LO - IPv6 collapsed destination address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6DST_HI - IPv6 collapsed destination address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6SRC_LO - IPv6 collapsed source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6SRC_HI - IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier (BCM56840 only)
bcmSwitchHashIP6Field1 BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 1 for IPv6 packets. - BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID, reusing BCM_HASH_FIELD_FLOWLABEL_LO selection controlled by bcmSwitchHashField1Ip6FlowLabel
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID, reusing BCM_HASH_FIELD_FLOWLABEL_HI selection controlled by bcmSwitchHashField1Ip6FlowLabel
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_NXT_HDR - Next header
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTL4 - Destination L4 port
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCL4 - Source L4 port
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_VLAN - VLAN ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_FLOWLABEL_LO - IPv6 flow label lower 16 bits, reusing BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD selection controlled by bcmSwitchHashField1Ip6FlowLabel
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_FLOWLABEL_HI - IPv6 flow label upper 4 bits, reusing BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT selection controlled by bcmSwitchHashField1Ip6FlowLabel
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6DST_LO - IPv6 collapsed destination address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6DST_HI - IPv6 collapsed destination address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6SRC_LO - IPv6 collapsed source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6SRC_HI - IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier (BCM56840 only)
bcmSwitchHashIP6TcpUdpField0 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for IPv6 TCP/UDP packets. Same as bcmSwitchHashIp6Field0
bcmSwitchHashIP6TcpUdpField1 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 1 for IPv6 TCP/UDP packets. Same as bcmSwitchHashIp6Field0
bcmSwitchHashIP6TcpUdpPortsEqualField0 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for IPv6 TCP/UDP packets whose source L4 port equals to destination L4 port. Same as bcmSwitchHashIp6Field0
bcmSwitchHashIP6TcpUdpPortsEqualField1 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 1 for IPv6 TCP/UDP packets whose source L4 port equals to destination L4 port. Same as bcmSwitchHashIp6Field0
bcmSwitchHashField0Ip6FlowLabel Enable flow label based hash field selection 0 for IPv6 packets. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashField1Ip6FlowLabel Enable flow label based hash field selection 1 for IPv6 packets. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashL2Field0 BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for L2 packets. - BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_VLAN - VLAN ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_ETHER_TYPE - Ether type
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACDA_LO - MAC destination address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACDA_MI - MAC destination address middle 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACDA_HI - MAC destination address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACSA_LO - MAC source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACSA_MI - MAC source address middle 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACSA_HI - MAC source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier (BCM56840 only)

  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6SRC_HI - IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits

bcmSwitchHashMPLSUseLabelStack BCM56440/BCM56640/BCM56560/BCM56970 If there are more than 3 labels, label stack (up to 5 labels) is used for hashing else Top 3 MPLS labels + payload IPV4/IPv6 fields will be selected for hashing. TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashMPLSExcludeGAL BCM56450/BCM56560 To exclude GAL label from hash computation TRUE/FALSE
bcmSwitchHashMPLSTunnelField0 BCM56634/BCM56524 enhanced hash field selection 0 for MPLS tunnel headers. - BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_VLAN - VLAN ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4DST_LO - IPv4 destination address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4DST_HI - IPv4 destination address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4SRC_LO - IPv4 source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP4SRC_HI - IPv4 source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6DST_LO - IPv6 collapsed destination address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6DST_HI - IPv6 collapsed destination address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6SRC_LO - IPv6 collapsed source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6SRC_HI - IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_RSVD_LABELS - Reserved second label, top label
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_2ND_LABEL - Second label
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_TOP_LABEL - Top label
bcmSwitchHashMPLSTunnelField0 BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for MPLS tunnel headers. - BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_3RD_LABEL - Third label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4SRC_LO - IPv4 source address lower 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4SRC_HI - IPv4 source address upper 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4DST_LO - IPv4 destination address lower 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4DST_HI - IPv4 destination address upper 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_LABELS_4MSB - Most significant 4 bits of top, second, and third label.
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_2ND_LABEL - Second label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_TOP_LABEL - Top label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier
bcmSwitchHashMPLSTunnelField0 BCM56440/BCM56640/BCM56560/BCM56970 enhanced hash field selection 0 for MPLS tunnel headers if bcmSwitchHashMPLSUseLabelStack is set and packet has more than 3 labels. - BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_3RD_LABEL_4MSB_5TH_LABEL - Third label or 4 most significant bits of 5th label.
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4SRC_IP6SRC_LO_4MSB_4TH_LABEL - IPv4 source address lower 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed source address lower 16 bits or 4th label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4SRC_IP6SRC_HI_4MSB - IPv4 source address upper 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits or 4 most significant bits of 1st,2nd,3rd labels.
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4DST_IP6DST_LO_5TH_LABEL - IPv4 destination address lower 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed destination address lower 16 bits or 5th label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4DST_IP6DST_HI_4TH_LABEL - IPv4 destination address upper 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed destination address upper 16 bits or 4th label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_LABELS_4MSB_3RD_LABEL - Most significant 4 bits of top, second, third labels or 3rd label alone.
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_2ND_LABEL - Second label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_TOP_LABEL - Top label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier
bcmSwitchHashMPLSTunnelField1 BCM56634/BCM56524 enhanced hash field selection 1 for MPLS tunnel headers. - BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID

  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_IP6SRC_HI - IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits

bcmSwitchHashMPLSTunnelField1 BCM56440/BCM56640/BCM56560/BCM56970 enhanced hash field selection 1 for MPLS tunnel headers if bcmSwitchHashMPLSUseLabelStack is set and packet has more than 3 labels. - BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_3RD_LABEL_4MSB_5TH_LABEL - Third label or 4 most significant bits of 5th label.
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4SRC_IP6SRC_LO_4MSB_4TH_LABEL - IPv4 source address lower 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed source address lower 16 bits or 4th label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4SRC_IP6SRC_HI_4MSB - IPv4 source address upper 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed source address upper 16 bits or 4 most significant bits of 1st,2nd,3rd labels.
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4DST_IP6DST_LO_5TH_LABEL - IPv4 destination address lower 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed destination address lower 16 bits or 5th label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_IP4DST_IP6DST_HI_4TH_LABEL - IPv4 destination address upper 16 bits or IPv6 collapsed destination address upper 16 bits or 4th label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_LABELS_4MSB_3RD_LABEL - Most significant 4 bits of top, second, third labels or 3rd label alone.
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_2ND_LABEL - Second label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_TOP_LABEL - Top label
  • BCM_HASH_MPLS_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier
bcmSwitchHashMIMTunnelField0 BCM56634/BCM56524/BCM56840 enhanced hash field selection 0 for MAC-in-MAC tunnel headers. - BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTMOD - Destination module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_DSTPORT - Destination port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCMOD - Source module ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_SRCPORT - Source port ID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_LOOKUP_ID_LO - Lower 16 bits of the ISID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_LOOKUP_ID_HI - Upper 8 bits of the ISID
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACDA_LO - MAC destination address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACDA_MI - MAC destination address middle 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACDA_HI - MAC destination address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACSA_LO - MAC source address lower 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACSA_MI - MAC source address middle 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_MACSA_HI - MAC source address upper 16 bits
  • BCM_HASH_FIELD_CNTAG_FLOW_ID - Congestion notification tag flow identifier (BCM56840 only)

bcmSwitchHashUseFlowSelTrunkUc Enable flow based hash selection for Trunk unicast. TRUE/FALSE

bcmSwitchTrunkHashSet0UnicastOffset BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840/BCM56860/BCM56960 enhanced hash bits selection 0 for unicast trunking. The control set and get RTAG7_PORT_BASED_HASH memory's SUB_SEL_TRUNK_UC, OFFSET_TRUNK_UC, and CONCATENATE_HASH_FIELDS_TRUNK_UC fields NOTE (BCM56860/BCM56960): for all bcmSwitch.*Hash.*Offset = SUB_SET + OFFSET
  1. SUB_SEL: 0(HASH_A0), 16(HASH_B0), 32(LBN), 36(DPORT), 52(LBID), 60(LBID), 68(HASH_A1), 84(HASH_B1)
  2. OFFSET : Offset of LSB for picking the hash value from the subset selected
  3. CONCATENATE: Determines whether the hash outputs from RTAG7 will be treated as a single 64 bit value or as four 16 bit fields.
0-48, 0-99 (BCM56840,BCM56860,BCM56960),>100 concat mode (BCM56860,BCM56960)
bcmSwitchTrunkHashSet1UnicastOffset BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840/BCM56860/BCM56960 enhanced hash bits selection 1 for unicast trunking. The control set and get RTAG7_PORT_BASED_HASH memory's SUB_SEL_TRUNK_UC, OFFSET_TRUNK_UC, and CONCATENATE_HASH_FIELDS_TRUNK_UC fields 0-48, 0-99 (BCM56840,BCM56860,BCM56960),>100 concat mode (BCM56860,BCM56960)
bcmSwitchTrunkHashSet0NonUnicastOffset BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840/BCM56860/BCM56960 enhanced hash bits selection 0 for non-unicast trunking. The control set and get RTAG7_PORT_BASED_HASH memory's SUB_SEL_TRUNK_NONUC, OFFSET_TRUNK_NONUC, and CONCATENATE_HASH_FIELDS_TRUNK_NONUC fields 0-48, 0-99 (BCM56840,BCM56860,BCM56960),>100 concat mode (BCM56860,BCM56960)
bcmSwitchTrunkHashSet1NonUnicastOffset BCM56700/BCM56800/BCM56580/BCM56840/BCM56860/BCM56960 enhanced hash bits selection 1 for non-unicast trunking.
